p.seg: Jeetendra, Shobha, Ekta And Tusshar Kapoor In A Major Blast From The Past
Actor Tusshar Kapoor, on Sunday, shared a special blast from the past to celebrate Parents' Day.
The actor shared an album, comprising a throwback picture of himself, his father Jeetendra, mother Shobha and sister Ekta Kapoor, and a recent one featuring his son.
In the old black and white photograph, actor Jeetendra can be seen posing for the camera while holding tiny Tusshar and Ekta Kapoor in his arms.
Jeetendra's wife can be seen standing near the trio in the picture.
In the second photo, Tusshar Kapoor and his son Laksshya can be seen smiling with all their heart for the camera.
Sharing the photos, Tusshar Kapoor captioned it: "Happy Parents' Day."
Tusshar Kapoor is a single parent.
Laksshya was born via surrogacy in the year 2016.
The actor often shares pictures and videos of his little son on Instagram.
In terms of work, Tusshar Kapoor was last seen in Booo Sabki Phategi.
He will be next seen in Laxmmi Bomb, which has been directed by Raghava Lawrence.
The film also features Akshay Kumar and Kiara Advani.

Ekta Kapoor, on the other hand, has produced several television shows and films such as Dream Girl, Hum Paanch, Dolly Kitty Aur Woh Chamakte Sitare, Ye Hai Mohabbatein, Kahaani Ghar Ghar Kii and Kasturi among others.
Jeetandra, Shobha Ekata da kuma Tusshar Kapoor sun tuna baya ciki kasaita
Jarumin fina-finai Tusshar Kapoor a ranar Lahadi ya yada wasu hotuna kuciyarsa cikin kasaita don murnar bikin zagayowar ranara iyaye ta duniya.

Jarumin ya yada wasu jerin hotuna da suka kunshi hotunansa yana yaro shi da mahaifinsa Jeetendra da babansa Shobha da kuma kuna kaawarsa Ekta Kapoor da kuma wani na baya-bayannan da ke dauke da shi da dansa.
A tsohon hoton maras launi, an ga jarumi Jeetendra ya yi tsayuwar daukar hoto yana rike dan jariri Tusshar da Ekta Kapoor a hannunsa.
Ana iya ganin matar Jeetendra a tsaye kusa da mutanen uku a cikin hoton.
A hoto na biyu Tusshar Kappor da dansa Laksshya na tsaye cikin fara'a da annashuwa suna kallon Kamara.
A rubutun da ya saka a jikin hoton da ya yada, ya rubuta "Ina taya ku murnar zagayowar ranar tunawa da iyaye"
Tusshar Kapoor yana zaune da 'ya'yansa da ba uwa.
An haifi Lakshiya ne ta hanyar daukar cikinta a wajen mahaifa a shakarar 2016.
Wadansu lokutan jarimin na yada hotunan da bidiyon karamin dan na sa a shafukan sada zumunta na Instagram.
A bangaren aiki kuwa, ganin karshe da aka yiwa Tusshar Kapoor shine a Sabki Phategi.
Ana sa ran sake ganinsa ne a fim din 'Laxmmi Bomb' wanda Raghava Lawarence ya bayar da umarni.
A cikin fin din da akwai kuma Akshay Kumar da Kiara Advani.

A daya bangaren kuma Ekita Kapoor ya shirya wasu shirya-shiryen Talbijin da kuma Fim kamar su Dream Girl da Hum Paanch da Dolly Kitty aur Chamakte Sitare, da Ye Hai Mohabbatein, da Kahaani Ghar Ghar Kii da kuma Kasturi da sauransu.
Delhi Metro Casts First Pier Under Phase-4 Work
The Delhi Metro has reached a major milestone in the Phase-4 work as it cast its first pier on the under-construction Janakpuri West-R K Ashram Marg corridor, officials said on Sunday.
The pier was cast at Keshopur on the elevated stretch between Keshopur and Mukarba Chowk on Saturday night.

"The Delhi Metro Rail Corporation took another important step forward in its Phase 4 construction work as the first pier of this phase of Metro expansion was cast on the Janakpuri West-R K Ashram Marg Metro corridor," the DMRC said in a statement.
This "major construction milestone" has been achieved, despite severe shortage of manpower and other logistical challenges because of the pandemic, officials said.
The average height of piers on this corridor is 10m.
However, piers will be 20m high at Madhuban Chowk (crossing with Line 1) and 25m at Haiderpur Badli Mor where this line will cross Line 2.
At Haiderpur Badli Mor, the viaduct level is going to be at 28m, the highest in the history of Delhi Metro, the statement said.
Presently, the highest point is at Dhaula Kuan, where the Line 7 viaduct passes at a height of 23.6m.
Piers, in terms of civil engineering are vertical loadbearing structures which act as intermediate support for adjacent ends of two spans.
They form the vertical support structures on which the elevated metro viaducts stand.
Metro piers today dot innumerable road medians in Delhi through which elevated Metro corridors run.
Pier numbers are now important landmarks for addresses across the Delhi-NCR.
The 28.92-km-long Janakpuri West-R K Ahsram Marg corridor is an extension of Magenta Line and will come up with 22 stations.
While 21.18 km of this corridor will be elevated, 7.74 km will be underground.
Construction work on this particular section had started in December last year.
On July 17, the work on the underground section of this corridor was commenced with the beginning of D Wall construction work at the Krishna Park Extension Metro station.
On 24th June, DMRC had started the casting work of u-girders which would be installed on the elevated section of this corridor.
Under Phase-4, 61.679 km of new metro lines shall be constructed across three different corridors comprising 45 metro stations.
These new sections shall provide interconnectivity among the already operational sections of Delhi Metro.
Out of this, 22.35 km will be underground while rest will be elevated.
An gina gada ta farko a aikin jirgi mai tafiya a kasrkashin kasa na Delhi a kashin aikin na 4

Aikin gina jirgi mai tafiya a karkashin kasa na birni Delhi ya cimma wani mataki mai muhimmanci yayin da ya shiga wani kashi a aikin-4 yayin da a ka gina gada ta farko a kan mashigar yamma na Janakpurita R K Ashram Marg, A cewar wasu jami'ai a ranar Lahadi.
An yi aikln gadar ne a Keshopur a kan wani tudu da ke tsaknin Keshpur da Mukaba Chowks a daren Asabar.

"Hukumar kula Jirgin karkashin kasa ta birnin Delhi ta sake samun kai wa ga wani babban mataki na 4 aikin da ta ke yi na fadada layin dogo na karkashin kasa da samun nasarar ginin karfe na wata gada a wata mashiga hanyar jirgin karakashin kasa ta yamma a Janakpuri RK Astta Marg," a cewar wata sanarawa da Hukumar DMRC ta fitar.

Wannan "babban nasara da aka samu a wannan aikin ginin layin dogo" an same ta ne duk da karancin ma'aikata da kuma wasu matsalolin jigila da kai-kawo saboda annobar cuta da ake fama da ita, a cewar wani jami'i.
Matsakaicin tsayin wannan gada ta wannan mashiga shine mita 10.
Sai daia sauran gadojin zasu zama masu tsawon mita 20 a Madhun Chowk (wurin tsallakawa n a 1)da kuma mita 25 a Haderpur Badli Mor a inda wannan layin dogo zai tsallaka wani layin dogon na 2.
A Haider, pur Mor, gadar da za ta dauki layin dogon da zai wuce ta wurin zai kasance mita 28, wanna shine mafi girma a tarihin layin dogo na birni Delhi, a cewar sanarwar.
A yanzu dai wuri ma fi tsawo shine wanda ya ke Dhaula Kuan, a inda layin dogo na 7 da ke kan gada ya wuce har tsawon mita 23.6.
A tsarin kimiyyar gine-gine ana yin ginshikin gine-gine ne a tsatstsaye domin su tallafin nauyin ginin da ke zama kamar gada a kan ginshikan biyu na gefe da gefe.
Wadannan su suka zama kamar ginshikan da suka tallafi tudun da aka dora layin dogon mai wucewa a kai.
Gadojin da a ka dora layin dogo na jirgin karkashi kasa da dora su a tsakiyar hanyoyin mota a birnin Delhi ta kan su ne aka giggina mashigar jiragen karkshin kasa.
Yawanci wadannan gadojin sun sa sun zama fittatun kuma ababen kwantace a wajen bayar da adireshi a birnin Delhi.
Mashigar layin dogo ta Janakpurin yamma - RK Ahsram ita ce ma fi tsawo da tsawon kilomita 28.92, ita ce karin layin dogo na MAgenta za ta kuma dauki tashohi 22.
Yayin da kilolmita 21.18 na wannan mashigar za a daga shi, yayin da 7.74 kilomita na wannan layi zai kasance a karkashin kasa.
An soma aikin ginin wannan sashi a watan Disambar shekarar da ta wuce.
A ranar 17 ga watan Yuli, a ka soma aikin ginin sashen karkashin kasa na mashigar wanda aka fara da gina bangon D a tashar jirgin karkashin kasa na wurin shakatawar Krishna.
A ranar 24 ga watan Yuli, Hukumar ta DMRC ta soma kakkafa karafunan zuba kankaren durakai da kuma ginshikai don daga layin dogon wannan bangare na mashigar layin dogon.
A karkashin wanna rukunin aiki na 4, kilomita 61. 679 na sabbin layukan dogo za a giggina a kan mashigai daban-daban guda uku da za su kunsh tasoshi 45 na jirgin kakshin kasa.
Wannan sabon sashi zai samar da wata babbar mahada a tsakanin shiyoyin daban-daban na jiragen karkashin kasa na birnin na Delhi.
A cikin wannan adadi, Kilomita 22.35 duk za su kasance a karkashin kasa ne yayin da sauran za su kasance a kan gadoji.
Over 13.85 lakh coronavirus cases in India so far, 32,063 deaths, 63.91% recovery rate
A total of 8,85,577 have recovered and the recovery rate is 63.91 per cent.
New Delhi: India reported 48,661 coronavirus cases in the last 24 hours, taking the total so far to 13,85,522, government data shows.
The number of death have risen to 32,063, with 705 deaths in the last 24 hours.
The number of coronavirus cases have doubled in nearly three weeks since July 2, when the country crossed the six lakh-mark.
The country's Covid tally touched the 10 lakh-mark last Friday.
Since then, around three lakh new infections have been reported.This is the fourth consecutive day when COVID-19 cases increased by more than 45,000.

Maharashtra on Saturday reported 9,251 new COVID-19 cases, taking the cumulative count in the state to 3,66,368 while fatalities mounted by 257, including 116 in Mumbai Metropolitan Region (MMR), to 13,389, the state Health department said.
A record number of 7,227 patients were discharged in the day, taking the count of recovered cases to 2,07,194.
Around 8.85 lakh patients have recovered so far; the recovery rate stood at 63.91 per cent this morning.
The positivity rate - percentage of patients who have tested positive for coronavirus - is 11 per cent.
Earlier this week, the government had said that it aims to bring down the positivity rate to 5 per cent.
Karnataka on Saturday registered over 5,000 new coronavirus cases for the third day in a row, taking its total past 90,000.
Bengaluru alone reported 2,036 new cases taking its overall tally to 43,503.

Delhi has improved its position in the number of active COVID-19 cases and is currently at the eighth spot among states and union territories in the country, Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal said on Saturday.
In the highest single-day spike till now, Kerala on Saturday reported 1,103 fresh COVID-19 cases taking the infection count to 18,098, while over 1.5 lakh persons are under observation.
As many as 9,420 persons are under treatment for coronavirus.
Coronavirus cases in Tamil Nadu have crossed the two lakh-mark with 6,989 new cases reported in the last 24 hours, which is also the biggest single-day spike, government data shows.
Eighty-nine have died and 7,758 have recovered in the last 24 hours.
The total cases in the state is now 2,06,737.

Gujarat on Saturday logged the highest single-day spike in coronavirus cases with 1,081 new infections, taking the total count to 54,712 while 22 patients died, including 11 in Surat, the state health department said.

Maharashtra Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray will launch a plasma donation program on July 27, following the "Plasma Daan Sankalp Abhiyan" for primary screening of recovered COVID-19 patients in Dharavi area of Mumbai.

India, the third worst-hit country in the global coronavirus tally after US and Brazil, has gradually ramped-up its COVID-19 testing capacity and has conducted over 4.2 lakh tests in a day, the Union Health Ministry said Saturday, crediting the increase to the number of labs for the achievement.
The pandemic has killed more than 6,33,000 people worldwide since it surfaced in China late last year, with more than 15.5 million people infected, according to news agency AFP.
Fiye da cutar Koronabirus dubu 13.85 ne a Indiya har zuwa yanzu, mutane 32,063 suka mutu, kashi 63.91% ne suka warke
Adadin mutane 8,85,577 ne suka warke kuma adadin kaso da suka warke ya kai kashi 63.91 cikin dari.

Garin New Delhi: Indiya ta ba da rahoton wadanda suka kamu da kwayar cutar ta coronabirus 48,661 a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata, suna ɗaukar jimillar zuwa 13,85,522, kamar yadda bayanan gwamnati sun nuna.
Adadin wadanda suka mutu ya haura 32,063, a inda mutane 705 suka mutu a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata.
Adadin wadanda suka kamu da kwayar cutar coronabirus ya ninka sau biyu a kusan makonni uku tun daga ranar 2 ga watan Yulin, a lokacin da kasar ta tsallake matakin dubu dari shida.
Yawan adadi na wadanda suka kamu da cutar Covid-19 na kasar ya kai makin dubu dari a ranar Juma'ar da ta gabata.
Tun daga wannan lokacin, an sami rahoton sabbin kamuwa da ya kai dubu uku. Wannan ita ce rana ta huɗu a jere lokacin da masu kamuwa da cutar COVID-19 suka ƙaru da fiye da 45,000.

Maharashtra a ranar Asabar ta ba da rahoton sabbin kamuwa da cutar 9,251 wadanda suka kamu da cutar ta COVID-19, inda suka dauki adadin a jihar zuwa 3,66,368 yayin da wadanda suka mutu suka kai 257, ciki har da 116 a yankin Mumbai yakin tsakiyar birni (MMR), zuwa 13,389, in ji Ma'aikatar Kiwon Lafiya ta jihar.
An sallami adadin marasa lafiya 7,227 a rana, inda aka dauki adadin wadanda suka warke zuwa 2,07,194.
Kimanin marasa lafiya dubu 8.85 ne suka warke ya zuwa yanzu; darajar farfadowa ya tsaya a kashi 63.91 bisa dari a safiyar yau.
Kaso na yawan wadanda suka kamu da cutar - yawan marasa lafiya waɗanda aka gwada aka kuma tabbatar sun kamu da kwayar cutar - shine kashi 11 cikin ɗari.
A farkon wannan makon ne, gwamnati ta ce tana da niyyar saukar da adadin wadanda suka kamu da ƙimar zuwa kashi 5 cikin 100.
Jihar Karnataka a ranar Asabar ya yi rajistar a sabbin wadanda suka kamu da cutar ta Koronavirus 5,000 a rana ta uku a jere, wanda hakan ya kai adadin ya haura 90,000 baki daya.
A Bengaluru kadai an bayar da rahoton sabbin mutanen da suka kamu da cutar zuwa 2,036 da suka kai jimillar adadin zuwa 43,503.

Matsayin birnin Delhi ya haura a cikin yawan wadanda aka samu da cutar COVID-19 kuma a halin yanzu birnin na matsayi na takwas tsakanin jihohi da yankuna da ke karkashin ikon gwmanatin tarayya a kasar, Babban Ministan Arvind Kejriwal ne ya faɗa a ranar Asabar.

A cikin wani karuwar adadi da aka taba samu a rana daya har zuwa yanzu, Kerala a ranar Asabar ta ba da rahoton mutane 1,103 sabbbi da suka kamu da COVID-19, wanada hakan ya daga adadin masu dauke da cutar zuwa 18,098, yayin da sama da dubban mutane 1.5 ake lura da su.
Kimanin mutane 9,420 ne ke karbar maganin cutar Koronabirus.

Yawan wadanda suka kanu da cutar Coronavirus a Tamil Nadu ya tsallake makin dubu dari tare da sabbin wadanda suka kamuwa da cutar 6,989 da aka rawaito a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata, wanda kuma shi ne mafi girma a rana guda, kamar yadda bayanan gwamnati ya nuna.
Mutane tamanin da tara sun mutu kuma 7,758 sun warke a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata.
Yawana adadin wadanda suka kamu a yanzu ya kai 2,06,737.

Gujarat a ranar Asabar ta shigar da bayanai mafi yawaa rana guda na adadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar Koronavirus da 1,081 na sabbin wadanda suka kamu da cutar, wanda hakan ya kai jimlar zuwa 54,712 yayin da marasa lafiya 22 suka mutu, ciki har da aka samu 11 a cikin Surat, a cewar ma'aikatar kiwon lafiya ta jihar.

Babban Ministan Maharashtra Uddhav Thackeray zai ƙaddamar da shirin bayar da gudummawar plasma a ranar 27 ga watan Yuli, bayan "Plasma Daan Sankalp Abhiyan" don binciken farko na marasa lafiyar COVID-19 da suka warke a yankin Dharavi na Mumbai.

Indiya ce ta uku a cikin kasashe masu fama da cutar Koronavirus a duniya bayan Amurka da Brazil, a hankali ta kara karfin gwajin cutar ta COVID-19 kuma ta gudanar da gwaje-gwaje sama da dubu dari 4.2 a cikin yini daya, Ma'aikatar Lafiya ta Tarayyar ta ce a ranar Asabar, tana mai yaba karuwar tare da danganaa samun wannan nasara ga yawan dakunan gawaje-gwaje da aka samu.

Annobar ta hallaka sama da mutane 6,33,000 a fadin duniya tun lokacin da cutar da bayyana a kasar Chima a shekarar da ta wuce, da samun yawan mutane sama da miliyan 15.5 wadanda suka kamu dac cutar, a cewar kamfanin dillancin labarai na AFP.
Troops destroy bandits' camp, eliminate bandits in Zamfara State

The air interdiction missions conducted by the Air Component of Operation HADARIN DAJI have destroyed a new camp belonging to the armed gang headed by the bandit leader known as "Dangote" in the Doumborou Forest area of Zamfara State.

The Coordinator Defence Media Operations, Major General John Enenche said the airstrike, which also resulted in the killing of several armed bandits, was executed following Human Intelligence (HUMINT) reports as well as series of confirmatory aerial surveillance missions.

Major General Enenche said the HUMINT established that members of the gang, along with their logistics items, motorcycles and hundreds of rustled livestock, had relocated from their erstwhile position to the new area by a rocky high ground within the Forest.
Enenche said the Air Component, therefore, dispatched an enhanced force package of Nigerian Air Force (NAF) fighter jets and helicopter gunships to attack the location.
According to him "the attack aircraft engaged the target area scoring accurate hits and taking out some of the bandits.
Many others, who were seen trying to flee the location in disarray, were mopped-up in follow-on attacks."

While commending the Air Component of Operation HADARIN DAJI for its professionalism, the Chief of the Air Staff (CAS), Air Marshal Sadique Abubakar, urged them to remain resolute in the conduct of airstrikes against armed bandits.

The Chief of the Air Staff tasked them to continue to provide close air support for the ongoing ground operations in order to eradicate all armed bandits and restore normalcy to the North-West and North-Central zones of the Country.
Sojoji sun karkashe tare da ragargaza sansanin 'yan bindiga a jihar Zamfara

Rundunar sojojin sama na gamayyar sojojin da suke yakin da aka labawa suna operation HADARIN DAJI sun yi raga-raga da wani sabon sansanin'yan bindiga da ke karkashin jagorancin wani mai suna “Dangote” a dajin Doumborou da ke jihar Zamfara.

Babban Jami'in da ke lura da ayyukan yada labaran da suka shafi tsaro, Manjo Janar John Enennche ya ce harin ta sama da aka kai wanda ya yi sanadiyyar mutuwar 'yan bindigan da dama, an aiwatar da shi ne bayan wasu rahotanni na lekan asiri na dan adam (HUMINT) da kuma tabbatattun hujjoji da aka samu na leken asirin da aka yi ta yi ta sama.

Manjo Janar Enenenche ya ce tsarin leken asiri na mutum da mutum da ake kira HUMINT ya tabbbtar da cewa 'yan bindigan su da kayan muhimman bukatunsu, da ababen hawansu da kuma daruruwan shanun sata, sun tashi daga inda a da suke, zuwa wannan sabon wuri kusa da wani wuri mai tsaunuka a cikin dajin

Enenche ya ce bangaren sojin sama na rundunar da ke yaki da 'yan bindigan daga bayan ta ya aika da wani rukuni na jiragen sojin saman Najeriya wada nda suka kunshi jirage masu saukar ungula masu dauke da manyan bindigogi da suka kai jerin hare-hare a kan sansanin.
A cewarsa, jirgen da suka kai harin yayi aikinsa yadda ya kamata a wurins ta inda ya dau sauti daidai ba tare da kuskurewa ba ya ragargaji 'yan bindiga da hakan ta sa ywancinsu suka rasa rayukansu.
Sauran wadanda suka yi kokarn su gudu cikin figici kuma an hallaka su a wani harin da aka kai musu ta kasa."

A sakonsa na jinjina ga sojin sama na rundunar yakin mai lakabi da HADARIN DAJI Shugaban sojojin sama na Najeriya Air Marshal Sadique Abubakar ya yi kira ga sojin saman da su kara zage damtse a aikin da suke yi na kai hare-hare ga 'yan bindigar.

Shugaban sojin sama na Najeriya ya yi kiransu da su cigaba da tallafawa rundunar sojin da suke aiki tare da kariya ta sama domin a kawo karshen duk wani ta'addanci da masu dauke da makami ke yi domin dawo da zaman lafiya a yankunan arewa maso gabas da kuma gabas ta tsakiya na kasar.
Francois Bozize, deposed CAR leader, announces presidential bid

Deposed former Central African Republic President Francois Bozize announced on Saturday his candidacy for the December presidential vote despite being under United Nations sanctions and subject to an arrest warrant for alleged crimes against humanity.
He made the announcement in a speech to a large crowd of supporters at a congress of his party, Kwa na Kwa (Work, Nothing But Work), in the capital Bangui.

The 73-year-old former general and army chief was overthrown in a 2013 rebellion by a coalition of mainly Muslim rebels from the north, plunging the majority Christian nation into a violent civil war and an acute and continuing humanitarian crisis.
"The country needs a man of experience, peace and conviction," Bozize said in the speech that criticised the tenure of the current president, Faustin-Archange Touadera.
Bozize first took power after a 2003 coup and served 10 years as president before fleeing the country in 2013.
The new administration sought his arrest for alleged crimes against humanity and incitement to genocide, but has not moved to arrest him since he returned from exile late last year.
It is not clear how the warrant or foreign sanctions will affect his candidacy.
In January, Bozize said he would ask the UN to lift the sanctions imposed in 2014 over his alleged support for Anti-balaka Christian armed groups.
Touadera governs today with the support of a large UN peacekeeping operation with more than 13,000 troops and police.
Elected in 2016, he is expected to seek a second term in the election but has not yet confirmed he will run.
The first round of the race is scheduled for December 27.
The government signed a peace deal in February 2019 with 14 armed groups, who typically claim to defend the interests of specific communities or religions.
Violence has since generally receded, but there are still bloody incidents, typically sparked by fighting over resources and most of the diamond-rich country remains beyond government control.
The violence has forced more than 1.5 million people to flee their homes.
Hambararren shugaban CAR Francois Bozize ya sanar da aniyarsa ta sake tsayawa takarar shugaban kasa

Hambararren shugaban kasar Jamhuriyar Africa ta tsakiya Francois Bozize a ranar Asabar ya sanar da aniyarsa ta sake tsayawa takara a zaben shugaban kasar da za a gudanar a watan Disamba duk da cewa Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta sa masa takunumi kuma za a iya kama shi don fuskantar hukunci a bisa zargin da a ke yi masa na aikata laifukan yaki.
Ya bayar da wannan sanarwar ce a wani jawabi da ya yi a gaban dubban jama'a magoya bayansa a taron jam'iyyarsa Kwa na Kwa (aiki sai mai shi) a babban birnin Bangui.

Dan shekara 73 da haihuwa Bozize tsohon janar din soja ne kuma shugaban rundunar sojojin kasar da wasu gamayyar kungiyoyin tawayen 2013 wanda yancinsu musulmai ne daga arewacin kasar suka yiwa juyin mulki wanda hakan ya jefa kasar da yawancinta Kristoci ne cikin wani kazamin yaki da kuma matsalar 'yan gudun hijira mai tsanani wanda har yanzu bai yanke ba.

"wannan kasa na bukatar mutum mai gogewa da son zaman lafiya da kuma ka'ida." Bozize ya na mai fadi a wani jawabi da yayi wanda ya kuma yi kakkausar suka ga shugabancin Faustin-Archange Touadera wanda ke kan kujera.
Bozizie ya jagoranci kasar ne bayan wani juyin mulki da ya yi a shekarar 2003 ya kuma shugabanci kasar har na tsawon 10 kafin ya tsere ya bar kasar a shekarar 2013.

Sanbuwar gwamnatin Kasar ta nemi a kama shi ne a bisa zarginsa da aikata laifukan yaki da kuma tunzura jama'a da hakan ya kai ga aikata kisan kiyashi, amma kuma ba a kama shi ba tun da ya dawo kasar daga gudun hijira a karshen shekarar da ta wuce.
Ba dai san yadda takardar izinin kama shi ba, da kuma takunkumin da kasashen waje suka sa masa zai iya shafar takarar ta sa.
A wataan Janairu, Bozize ya ce zai bukaci ta dage takunkumin da sa mi shi a bisa zargin da ake yi mi shi na goyon bayan kungiyar Kiristoci masu dauke da maka ta Anti - Balaka a shekarar 2014.
A yanzu Touadera ne ke mulkida taimakon wata babbar runduna rwanzar da zaman lafiya ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniy da ke da dakaru 13,000 na 'yan sanda da Soji.
An zabe shi a sheklarar 2016, a na kuma sa ran zai sake tsayawa takara na wa'adi na biyu a zaben da ake shirin yi ko da yake ba a tabbatar da hakan ba tukunna.
An shirya soma zagayen farko na yakin neman zaben a ranar 27 Disamba.
A cikin watan Fabarairu 2019 Gwamnatin kasar ta sanya hannun wata yarjejeniyar zaman lafiya da wasu kungiyoyi 14 masu dauke da makamai da suke ikirarin kare muradin wasu al'umma ko wani addini.

Tuni dai tashe-tashe hankali ya lafa, sai da akan samu daidaiku mummunan tashin hankli nn da can mai kamar kullum nasaba da fada kan mallakar arzikin kasa yayin da yawancin arzikin lu'lun da ke kasar na yankunan da ba sa karkashin ikon gwamnati.
Wannan tashin hankali ya tilastwa mutane sama da milyan 1.5 tserewa daga gidajensu.
Malaysia searches for 24 Rohingya feared drowned off island

KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia (AP) - Malaysian authorities said Sunday that they were searching for two dozen Rohingya refugees who are feared to have drowned after jumping off their boat off the northern resort island of Langkawi.

Zawawi Abdullah, a senior official with the Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency, said initial police information showed that only one of 25 Rohingya men who jumped off the boat had managed to swim ashore.
The lone survivor sought help from police late Saturday and has been detained for further investigation, Zawawi said.
Hundreds of thousands of Muslim Rohingya have fled Myanmar due to a military crackdown, and many live in densely crowded refugee camps in Bangladesh.
Muslim-dominated Malaysia has been a common destination of boats arranged by traffickers who promise the refugees a better life abroad.
Zawawi said two vessels and an aircraft were deployed in the search.
He said the agency will also alert local fishermen and authorities in neighboring Thailand to assist in the search.
He didn't provide further details on the boat.

Last month, Malaysian authorities detained 269 Rohingya refugees and found a body on board a suspected smuggling boat off Langkawi that they said had been intentionally damaged so it couldn't be turned back to sea.
The Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency later said that the 269 were transferred from a larger vessel on which dozens of people were believed to have died and their bodies thrown into the sea.
Prime Minister Muhyiddin Yassin said Malaysia cannot accept any more Rohingya refugees as it struggles with an economic slowdown due to the coronavirus pandemic.
But he said those already in the country will not be sent back out to sea.
Malaysia is home to over 2 million illegal immigrants as well as some 180,000 refugees and asylum seekers - including 101,000 Rohingya - who are registered with the U.N. refugee agency.
Malaysia na neman 'yan Rohingya 24 da ake zaton sun nutse daga wajenn tsibirin

Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (AP) - Mahukuntan Malaysia sun fada jiya Lahadi cewa suna neman wasu ‘yan gudun hijira‘ yan kabilar Rohingya su kimanin dozin biyu wadanda ake fargabar sun nutse bayan sun tsalle daga kwale-kwalensu daga tsibirin shakatawa na arewacin Langkawi.

Zawawi Abdullah, wani babban jami’i a hukumar tabbatar da bin dokar ruwa ta Malaysia, ya ce bayanan ‘yan sanda na farko sun nuna cewa mutum daya ne kawai daga cikin‘ yan Rohingya 25 da suka yi tsalle daga kwale-kwalen ya yi nasarar yin iyo har ya kai gaɓar teku.
Wanda ya tsira shi kadai ya nemi taimako daga 'yan sanda da yammacin ranar Asabar kuma an tsare shi don ci gaba da bincike, in ji Zawawi.
Dubun dubatar musulmin Rohingya sun tsere daga Myanmar saboda wata mamaya da sojojin kasar suka kai musu, kuma da yawa suna zaune ne a sansanonin ‘yan gudun hijira da ke cunkoson mutane a Bangladesh.
Kasar Malesiya da Musulmai suka fi yawa ta kasance wani wuri da jiragen ruwan da masu fataucin mutane ke shiryawa ke yi wa ‘yan gudun hijirar romn baka na samun kyakkyawar rayuwa a kasashen waje.
Zawawi ya ce an tura jiragen ruwa biyu da kuma jirgin sama a binciken da ake na wadanda suka nutsen.
Ya ce hukumar za ta kuma fadakar da masunta na cikin gida da hukumomin makwabciyar kasar Thailand don taimakawa wajen binciken.
Bai bayar da wani karin bayani ba dangane da jirgin ruwan 'yan gudun hijirar ba.

A watan da ya gabata, hukumomin Malaysia sun tsare ‘yan gudun hijirar Rohingya 269 kuma sun gano wata gawa a cikin jirgin da ake zargi na fasakwaurin ne nesa daga Langkawi wanda suka ce da gangan aka lalata shi don a kara juya shi zuwa teku.
Daga baya Hukumar tabbatar da bin dokar ruwa ta Malaysia ta ce mutanen 269 an sauke su ne daga wani babban jirgi wanda aka yi imanin cewa mutane da dama sun mutu kuma an jefa gawarwakinsu cikin teku.
Firayim Minista Muhyiddin Yassin ya ce Malaysia ba za ta iya karbar wasu karin 'yan gudun hijirar Rohingya ba yayin da take fama da koma bayan tattalin arziki saboda bullar annobar cutar Koronabirus.
Amma yace wadanda suke kasar ba za mayar da su cikin Teku ba.

Malaysia ta kasance gida ga sama da baƙin haure miliyan 2 da kuma wasu 'yan gudun hijira 180,000 da masu neman mafaka - gami da' yan Rohingya 101,000 - waɗanda suka yi rajista da hukumar kula da 'yan gudun hijira ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya.
Wilfried Zaha wants to leave Crystal Palace, says Roy Hodgson: "Watch this space"
Crystal Palace manager Roy Hodgson dealt a blow to fans ahead of the close-season by revealing star attacker Wilf Zaha wants to leave the club.
The Ivorian international has been at Selhurst Park for over five years and now looks set to depart, having previously been linked with the likes of Arsenal and Bayern Munich.

At age 27 it remains to be seen if that calibre of club are still interested in splashing out a large fee on him, particularly this summer with the economic uncertainty in the sport, after a campaign in which Zaha scored four goals and claimed five assists for a Palace side which failed to inspire.

Speaking post-match after the final day, Hodgson told TalkSport's Alex Crook to "watch this space" regarding Zaha's probable exit after acknowledging the forward has "made it clear" he sees his future away from the club.
The forward still has three years left on his current Palace deal and they last year suggested it would take £100m to prise him away from the club.
Hodgson's side wrapped up the campaign with seven straight defeats and a final-day draw, dropping to 14th place in the process.
Zaha himself netted just once between mid-December and the end of the season, a long-range strike in a defeat to Chelsea.
He was reported to have handed in a transfer request last summer in a bid to force a move away, but a bid didn't materialise to tempt Palace to sell.
In an apparent move to boost his chances of a departure, Zaha changed agents in January and his priority for the weeks ahead will clearly be to secure a move away.

Zaha was the player to feature for the most minutes in the Premier League this season for Palace and the only member of the squad under 28 years of age to play 1,100 minutes or more, pointing to the level of rebuild which might be required in the squad with the potential fee brought in for the No 11.
Wilfred Zaha na so ya bar kungiyar Crystal Palace a cewar Roy Hudgson: "Ci gaba da sa ido a wannn gurbin"

Mai kula da kungiyar Crystal Palace Roy Hodgson ya fadarwa da 'yan kallon gaba a gabannin karshen kakan wasanni a yayin da ya fadi cewa mai farin jinin Wilf Zaha mai kai hari na kungiyar na shirin barin kungiyar wasan kwallon kafar.

Dan asalin kasar Cote d ivore kuma tauraron kasa da kasa da ya dade da Selhurst Park har na sama da shekaru biyar, yanzu ya soma tattara kayansa zai matsa gaba, bayan da shahararsa ake alakantar da ita ga Arsenal da kuma Bayern Munich.

A shekara 27 da haihuwa kowa ya nade hannnnsa domin ganin ko manya-manya kulod irin wadannan na da sha'awara yi masa ruwan kudi, musamman ma a wannan bazara da ke cike da fargabar koma bayan tattalin arziki a harkar wasanni, Bayan fatatawar da aka yi a in da Zaha ya ci kwallaye hudu ya kuma samu nasarar taimakawa a ci har sau biyar don samun gurbi a kungiyar Palace wanda hakan bai yiwu ba.

Yayin da ya ke jawabi bayan fafatawar da aka yi a wasan karshe, Hodgson ya fadawa Alex Crock na shirin 'TalkSport' cewa "ka sa ido kan wannan gurbin" dangane da kila-wa-kala na barin Zaha kulob din bayan ya amsa cewa, dan gaban ya "fito karara" cewa yana ganin cigabansa ne a can wani wuri nesa da wannan kungiya.

Dan wasan gaban har yanzu yana da sauran shekaru uku da suka rage a yarjejeniyarsa da kungiyar Palace kuma a shekarar da ta wuce suna masu cewa suna da bukatar Fam miliyan 100 idan suna so su yakice shi daga kungiyar.
Bangaren Hodgson sun kammala jerin wasannin da suke yi ne da shan kashi har sau bakwai a jere da kuma kunnen doki a ranar karshe wanda hakan ya sa suka koma mataki na 14 a tafiyar.
Zaha da kansa ya ci kwallo sau daya ne kawai a tsakiyar watan Disamba da kuma a karshen kakar wasan, wani diba mai dogon zango na rashin samun nasara ga kungiyar Chelsea.

An bayar da rahoton cewa ya mika takardar neman sauya kungiyar a bazarar da ta wuce a kokarinsa na ya kaucewa abin da ake gudu, amma hakan bai yiwu ba da har zai ja hankalin kungiyar Palace din ta sayar da shi.

A wani kokari na zahiri na habaka damarsa na barin kungiyar, Zaha ya sauya ajen din sa a watan Janairu da kuma muhimman abubuwan da ke gabansa na makonni masu zuwa na nuna karara cewa shine ya bar kungiyar.

An shirya cewa Zaha ne zai taka rawa a yawancin mintunan wasan gasar Primier a wannan kakar wasa da kungiyar Palace za ta yi, baya da cewa shine kadai da wasan da ke kasa da shekara 28 da haihuwa da zai yi wasa har na tsawon mintuna 1,100 ko sama da haka, duba da yadda aka da bukatar yin garanbawul a 'yan wasan da wasu karin kudi da aka yiwa mai buga lamba 11.
Cease-fire in war-torn eastern Ukraine to begin at midnight

KYIV, Ukraine -- Ukrainian and rebel forces in war-torn eastern Ukraine have started preparing for a "full and comprehensive" cease-fire scheduled to begin at midnight, a move that officials hope can lead to more steps to resolve the 6-year-old conflict.
Rebel officials said Sunday they have instructed their troops about the cease-fire and issued a decree banning the use of weapons.
Ukraine's military said their forces "have begun preparations" for the ceasefire.
If upheld, it would "pave the way for implementing other clauses" of the Minsk peace deal, the office of Ukraine's president said earlier this week, calling the cease-fire a "breakthrough."

Brokered in 2015 by France and Germany, the Minsk peace plan aimed to resolve the conflict between Ukraine and Russia-backed separatists that flared in 2014 after Russia's annexation of Crimea and its support for the separatists.
The conflict has since killed more than 14,000.
The presidents of Russia and Ukraine both commended the cease-fire deal in a phone call Sunday and underscored the importance of implementing the agreements reached at the December summit in Paris.

Russia President Vladimir Putin expressed concern over Kyiv's calls to revise the Minsk agreements and said Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy's "position about the non-alternative nature of the Minsk agreements, once again voiced during this call, should translate into real actions," the Kremlin said.

Zelenskiy in turn, stressed the need "for further practical steps" aimed at releasing Ukrainians who are imprisoned by rebels in eastern Ukraine, in the annexed region of Crimea and in Russia, according to a statement by his office.
The 2015 deal envisaged that Ukraine can regain control over its border with Russia in the separatist-held regions only after they are granted broad self-rule and hold local elections.
The accord helped reduce the scope of hostilities, but Ukrainian forces and the rebels have continued to exchange artillery salvos and gunfire.
In December, the leaders of Ukraine, Russia, France and Germany met in Paris for another round of talks, expressing support for the Minsk deal and agreeing to revive the peace process.

Zelenskiy, who won the 2019 election on promises to end the conflict, wanted Ukraine to get control of its border first before local elections, but the Kremlin has insisted the deal should be implemented without revisions.

The new cease-fire deal was reached Wednesday by members of the Tripartite Contact Group that includes representatives of Russia, Ukraine and the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe, and was welcomed by EU officials.

During his traditional Sunday blessing in St. Peter's Square, Pope Francis also commended the cease-fire, adding that it needed to be put into practice ″to rebuild confidence and lay the foundations for a much needed and long awaited reconciliation with the people.″
Yarjejeniyar tsagaita wuta a gabashin kasar Ukraine wacce yaki ya daidaita za ta soma aiki da tsakar dare.

KYIV, Kasar Ukraine - Sojojin Ukraine da na 'yan tawaye da ke gabashin Ukraine sun soma shirye-shiryen a aiki da wata "cikakkekiyar" yarjejeniyar tsagata wuta da aka shirtya za ta soma aiki a tsakar daren, wani yunkuri ne da jami'ai ke fatan zai kai ga wasu karin matakan samar da zaman lafiya a rikicin da su da ya kai shekara 6.
Shugabannin 'yan tawaye sun ce a ranar Lahadi, sun umarci dakarunsu da su shirya tsagaita wuta, sun kuma kafa dokar haramta amfani da makamai
Sojojin Kasar Ukraine sun ce dakarunsu sun soma shirye-shiryen soma aikin da tsakaita wuta.

Idan ka yi da yarjejeneiyar, hakan zai "samar da hanyar da za ayi aiki da wasu saddarorin" daga cikin yarjejeniiyar da aka kulla a birnin Minsk, ofishin shugaban kasar Ukraine ya ce a farkon a wanna mako. yana mai kiran wannan tsagaita wuta da cewa "babban cigaba"

Kasashen Fransa da Jamus da suka shiga tsakani a 2015, Yarjejeniyar da aka kulla ta shirya sasanta rikicin da ke tsakanin Ukraine da 'ya awaren da kasar Rasha ta ke goyawa baya, rikicin da ya brake a shekarar 2014 bayan da kasar Rasha ta mamaye yankin Crimea da kuma goyawa 'yan tawaye baya.
Rikicin dai ya yi sanadiyyar mutuwar mutane sama da 14,000.

Shugabannin kasar Rasha da na Ukaraine duk sun yi san barka da yarjejeniyar tsagaita wutar da aka cimma a wata hira ta wayar tarho da aka yi da su a ranar Lahadi wanda hakan ya nuna muhimmancin aiki da yarjejeniyarda aka cimma a watan Disamba a wani taro a birnin Farisa.

Shugaban Kasar Rasha Vladamir Putiin ya nuna damuwarsa na kiraye-kiraye da Kyiv ta ke yi na a sake duba yarajejeniyoyin da aka yi a MInsk, ya kuma ce shugaban kasar Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskiy " matsayinsa na babu madadi ga yarjejeniyoyin Minsk, ya sake fada wayar da aka yi da shi, toh ya kamata a yi aiki da su sau da kafa. A fadar ta Kremlin ta sanar.

Daga bangarensa kuwa Zelenskiy, jaddada bukatar "sake samun matsayi na zahiri ya yi wadanda za su kai ga sakin 'yan Ukraine da ke hannun 'yan tawayen gabashin Ukraine, da ke cikin yakin Crimea da Rasha ta mamaye da kuma a can cikin Rashan, a cewar ata sanarawa ta da fito daga ofishinsa.

A yarjejeniyar ta shekarar 2015 a na sa rai cewa Ukraine za ta iya mado da ikonta kan bakin iyakokinta da Rasha a wuraren da ke hannun 'yan yawaye ne kawai bayan ta ba su 'yancin cin gashin kansu an kuma gudanar da zabuka na cikin gida.
Yarjejeniyuar dai ta taimaka wajen rage yawan fadace-fadace, Sai dai sojojin Ukraine da kuma na 'yan tawaye sun cigaba da musayar wuta da manya - manyan bindigogin atileri da kuma kanana.

A watan Disamba ne, shuagabanin Kuraine da na Rasha da na Faransan da kuma na Jamus suka hadu a birnin Farisa dona sake wani zagayen tattaunawa, suna masu bayyana goyon bayansu ga yarajejeniyar Minsk da kuma yarda da farfado da matakan yarajejeniyar zaman lafiya.

Zelenskiy wanda ya lashe zaben 2019 bisa alkawarain da ya yi na kawo karshen rikicin na son Ukraine da farako ta samu damar iko da iyakokinta kafin a fara zabn cikin gida, amma fadara Kremlin ta dage kan cewa a yi da yarjejeniyar ba tare da an sake yin bitar ta ba.

An dai cimma sabuwar yarjejeniyar tsagaita wutar ne a ranar Laraba tare da wata 'yan kungiyar tuntubar juna ta Tripartite da ta kunshi wakilan Rasha da Ukraine da kuma Kungiyar Kula da Tsaro da kuma Hadin kan kasasashen Turai, ta kuma samu karbuwa daga jami'an Tarayyara Turai.

A addua'r da ya saba yi duk ranar Lahadi a dandalin St Peters, Papa Roma Francis ya yabawa yarjejeniyar tsagaita wutar da ka kulla, yan mai addu'ar Allah Ya sa su yi aiki da ita "don ta sake gina karfin gwiwa ta kuma assasa ginshikin da zai samar da abin ada ake da bukata, na sasanta juna da a ke bukata da kuma neman zaman jira.″
Hunger organization pushes out Yoho after Capitol incident

WASHINGTON (AP) - A nonpartisan Christian organization that seeks to end hunger said Saturday it asked for and received the resignation of Rep. Ted Yoho from its board of directors following what it called his "verbal attack" on Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.
Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y., accused Yoho, R-Fla., of using a vulgar and sexist insult while upbraiding her during a confrontation last Monday on the steps of the Capitol.
Yoho maintained he did not use the words cited, though a reporter who witnessed the incident confirmed the language as she described it.

In a statement, Bread for the World said its board met Friday with Yoho and sought his resignation "as an action that reaffirms our commitment to coming alongside women and people of color, nationally and globally, as they continue to lead us to a more racially inclusive and equitable world."
On its website, Bread for the World says its "collective Christian voice" lobbies Congress and the administration on ending hunger nationally and worldwide.

"As a bipartisan Christian organization committed to alleviating hunger and poverty through sound public policies, Bread for the World upholds the values of respect, dignity, and compassion that Jesus calls us to when engaging decision makers from across the political spectrum," the statement said.
"We believe that Rep. Ted Yoho's recent actions and words as reported in the media are not reflective of the ethical standards expected of members of our Board of Directors."
A spokesman for Yoho did not immediately respond to an email seeking comment.

In an extraordinary speech Thursday in the House, Ocasio-Cortez offered a dramatic account of the incident and broadened her remarks to assail what she called a sexist culture of "accepting violence and violent language against women."
More than a dozen colleagues joined her in casting the incident as all-too-common male behavior.
Yoho has described the encounter as a brief policy discussion and said that "no one was accosted, bullied, or attacked."
He expressed regret for his "abrupt manner."
Ocasio-Cortez, 30, is a freshman progressive who has gained praise and criticism for her outspokenness.
Yoho, 65, one of the most conservative members of the House, is retiring at the end of his fourth term.
Kungiyar yaki da yunwa ta fatattaki Yoho bayan lamarin da ya faru a Capitol

WASHINGTON (AP) - Wata kungiya Kiristoci marasa nuna bangaranci da ke kokarin kawo karshen yunwa ta ce a ranar Asabar, ta nema ta kuma karbi takardar barin aikin dan majalisa Ted Yoho daga hukumar daraktocinsa bayan wani abin da ta kira "zagin cin mutunci" da ya yiwa 'yar majalisa Alexandria Ocasio -Cortez.

Ocasio - Cortez, daga gundumar New York, ta zargi Yohi mai wakiltar Florida a majalisar, da amfani da kakkausar kalamai da kuma na isakanci na batanci a gareta a yayin da suke cece-ku-ce a ranar Litinin da ta gabata a kan matakalar zuwa zauren majalisar na Capitol.
Yoho ya musanta yin amafani da kalaman da ta fada, duk da cewa wani dan jarida wanda aka yi abin a gabansa ya tabbatar da cewa ya yi amfani da mummunan kalamai kamar yadda ta bayyana.

A sanarwar da ta fitar, Kungiyar burodi ga duniya ta ce hukumar daraktocinta sun gana a ranar Juma'a da Yoho sun kuma bukaci da ya mika takardarsa ta barin kujerar hukumar "domin wannan ya zama mataki da ke dada tabbatar da aniyarmu ta tafiya mata tare da kuma duk wasu al'umma na launin fata, da kasa daban-daban yayin da suke kokarin jagorantarmu zuwa samun yanayi na duniya daya alumma daya."
A shafin kungiyar na yanar gizo, kungiyar ta ciyar da burodi ga duniya ta ce " hadaddiyar muryar kiristoci" mai zawarcin majalisa da kuma gwamnati kan yaki da yunwa a kasa da kuma duniya baki daya.

"kungiyar kiristoci mai goyon bayan jam'iyyun siyasa da ta mayar da hankali wajen yadda za a kawo karshen yunwa da talauci ta hanyar ingantaccen tsare-tsaren da manufofin jama'a, kungiyar da na mutunta akidu da mutumta, gami da tausayi irin wanda Yesu ya yi kira gare mu da mu yi a yayin da muke tattaunawa da masu rike da ragamar mulki daga kowacce jam'iyya", Sanarwa ta ce.

"Mun yi amanna da cewa abin da danmajalisa Ted Yoho ya aikata da kuma kalamansa kamar yadda aka bayar da rahoto a kafofin yada labarai, ba sa nuni da kima da kuma da'ar da muke so 'ya 'yan wannan hukumar Daraktoci su nuna."
Mai magana da yawun Yoho bai ce komai ba da aka bukaci jin ta bakinsa ta email.

A wani jawabi na ban mamaki a ranar Alhamin a majalisa, Ocsio-Cartez da ta bayar da bayanin abin da ya faru a cikin wani lamari na ban mamaki tare da fadada da a bayanan nata na irin cin zarafi da abin da kira fifikon jinsi na dabi'a "da tursasa mata karbar zalunci da bakaken kalaman zalunci ga mata"
'Yan uwanta 'ya majalisa sama da sha biyu ne suka goya mata baya wajen yin Allah wadai da kuma cewa wannan bisa yawancin halayya ce ta kusan kowanne namiji.
Yoho ya bayyana abin da ya faru da cewa wata 'yar tattaunawa ce kan manufofi sannan ya kuma kara da cewa "babu wani wanda aka yiwa barazana, ko ciwa mutunci ko kai wa hari."
Ya kuma yi nadamar nuna "saurin fushinsa."
Ocasio-Cortez 'yar shekara 30 sabuwar shiga majalisa mai ra'ayin 'yan gaba dai-gaba dai wacce ta samu yabo da kuma suka saboda fito-na fiton da ta ke yi.
Yoho dan shakara 65 na daya daga cikin mafi ra'ayin rikau a majalisar, yana dab da yin ritaya a karshen wa'adin zamansa na majalisa karo na hudu.
Israelis continue protests against PM's handling of pandemic

JERUSALEM (AP) - Thousands of Israelis held several demonstrations across the country against their prime minister Saturday, with the main protest taking place in Jerusalem outside the official residence of Benjamin Netanyahu.
The protests have been going on for the past few weeks, sparked by what critics see as a government failure to handle the coronavirus crisis after initially keeping the threat of the virus at bay.
Corruption charges against Netanyahu have further fueled the demonstrations.
"Bibi, go home," read one sign held by a protester.
Another placard read "Everyone can see that the emperor has lost his clothes."
Hundreds of protesters Saturday also gathered outside Netanyahu's beach house in the upscale town of Caesarea.
Last week, police used water cannons to disperse crowds in Jerusalem.
After what has been called a hasty and erratic reopening of the economy in May, infections shot up with the average number of new cases daily at 2,000.
The country's economy has been battered by virus restrictions and the unemployment rate has skyrocketed to nearly 20%.
Protesters say the government's offers of financial assistance have been nowhere near enough.
The protests came in the shadow of Netanyahu's corruption trial which resumed this month.
Hearings will start in January.
He is charged with fraud, breach of trust and accepting bribes in a series of scandals.
Israilawa suna cigaba da zanga-zanga kan yadda Firayi ministan kasar ke tukarar wannan annoba

Birnin JERUSALEM (AP) - Dubban yahudawa ne suka gudanar da wasu jerin zanga-zanga a fadin kasar kan Firayi Ministan kasar a ranar Asabar, yayin da babbar zanga-zanga aka yi ta a birnin Jerusalem a kofar gidan Benjamin Netanyahu.

An yi ta gudanar da zanga-zangar har na tsawon makonni, a kan abin da masu suka ke gani a matsayin gazawar gwamnati na yadda ta ke tafi da halin da aka shiga mai tashin hankali dangane da cutar Koronabirus bayan da a farko ta na mai kore barazanar a cutar a kasar.
Tuhumar da ake yiwa Netanyahu na cin hanci ya dada izza wutar zanga-zangar.
"Bini ka tafi gida", a wani rubutu da wani mai zanga-zanga ya ke rike da shi.
Wani kwalli ma an rubuta "kowa dai yana ganin cewa sarki a tube ya ke ya zub da kayansa na sawa"
Daruruwan masu zanga-zanga ne a ranar Asabar suka taru a kofar gidan Netanyahu da ke bakin wara gaba a wata unguwar masu hannu da shuni da ke garin Caesarea.
A makon da ya wuce, 'yan sanda sun yi amfani da ruwa mai karfi daga bututu don a tarwatse taron jama'a a Jerusalem.

Bayan wani abin da aka kira shawara ta gaggawa mai cike da kurkurai na bude tattalin arziki a watan Mayu, yawan wadanda suka kamu da cutar ya karu da kiyasin sabon wani ya kamu a kowacce rana a 2,000.
Tattalin arzikin kasar ya yi raga-raga sakamakon bayyanar cutar da kokarin dakileta ga kuma yawan marasa aikin yi da ke tashin gwaron zabi zuwa kusan 20%.
Masu zanga-zanga suna cewa tallafin da gwamnati ta ke bayarwa ba sa kaiwa ko ina ballatana su kai ga isa.
Zanga-zangar na zuwa ne bayan da ake zargin Netanyahu da laifin cin hanci wanda za a cigaba a wannan watan.
Za a ci gaba da sauraron shari'ar a watan Janairu.
Ana tuhumarsa da zamba da cin amana da kuma karbar cin hanci a cikin wasu jerin abin kunyar da ya aikata.
Police: Man fatally shot at protest in Texas
AUSTIN, Texas (AP) - A man was fatally shot at a protest in Texas when he approached a vehicle and the driver inside opened fire, police said.
The shooting happened just before 10 p.m. during a protest in Austin, police spokesperson Katrina Ratliff told reporters early Sunday.
The man was taken to a hospital where he was later pronounced dead.
The vehicle had honked, turned down a road and then sped toward protesters, witness Michael Capochiano told the Austin American-Statesman.
The man, who Capochiano said was carrying a rifle, approached the vehicle and was shot by the driver.
The driver then drove away, Capochiano said.
Initial reports indicated "the victim may have been carrying a rifle," Ratliff told reporters, adding that the suspect was detained and was cooperating with police.
The crowd gathered Saturday for a Black Lives Matter protest, news outlets reported.
The demonstration was streamed live on Facebook and captured audio of a vehicle's horn honking and several gunshots being fired.
'Yan sanda: an harbi wani mutum a yayin zanga-zanga a Texas
AUSTIN, Texas (AP) - An yiwa wani mutum mummunan harbi a yayin da ake zanga-zanga a Texas a lokacin da ya tinkari wata mota kuma direban ya bude masa wuta, a cewar 'yan sanda.
Harbin ya faru ne da misalin karfe 10 na yamma a wata zanga - zangar da aka yi a Austin, Katrina Ratliff mai magana da yawun 'yansanda ta fadawa 'yan jarida a safiyar ranar Lahadi.
An garzaya da mutumin Asibiuti a inda likitoci suka tabbatar da cewa ya mutu.
Motar ta yi hon sannan ta yi kwana zuwa wani layi, ta kuma yi cikin masu zanga-zangar cikin sauri, Micheal Capochiano wani da aka yi kan idonsa ya fadawa jaridar Austin American Statesman.
Mutumin da Capochiano ya ce na dauke da wata doguwar bindiga, ya tinkari motar ne sai kuma direban ya harbe shi.
Direban kuma ya yi tafiyarsa, a cewar Capochiano.
Rahotanni na farko na nuna cewa " mutumin da aka harba na dauke da bindiga," Ratliff ya fadawa 'yan jarida, ya kuma kara da cewa ana tsare da wanda ake zargi kuma yana na 'yan sanda hadin kai.
Tarin jama'a ce ta taru a ranar Asabar a wata zanga-zanga kan rayuwar ba bakaken fata ma na muhimmanci, a cewar kafofin yada labarai.
An sa zanga-zangar kai tsaye a shafin sada zumunta na Facebook an kuma dauki sautin hon din motar da kuma karar harbin bindiga a kai-akai da ake iya ji.
FDNY diversity official says 'most definitely' OK to exclude white firefighter from color guard
An FDNY diversity official has said that it's 'most definitely' acceptable to keep a white firefighter off a ceremonial color guard so the flag bearers could all be black, according to a new report.

White firefighter Lt. Daniel McWilliams filed a lawsuit claiming racial bias after he was removed from a flag-bearing unit at a November 2017 memorial mass honoring deceased members of the Vulcan Society, a fraternal society of black firefighters.
And FDNY's chief diversity and inclusion officer, lawyer Cecilia Loving, has defended the decision at a New York state Division of Human Rights trial, The New York Post reports.
McWilliams was one of the three FDNY firefighters seen in an iconic photo as they hoist the American flag at Ground Zero in the days after the 9/11 attacks.
According to McWilliams' complaint, he been selected by the FDNY Ceremonial Unit to serve as one of the flag bearers in the color guard at the memorial service.
Being a flag bearer at the event was an 'esteemed honor and privilege' for McWilliams, according to his lawsuit, CNN reported.

Upon his arrival at the event, however, McWilliams was barred from participating in the color guard by then-Vulcan Society president Regina Wilson because she allegedly had asked for an all-black color guard at the mass.
She then asked McWilliams - a 29-year FDNY veteran - to 'help in a different capacity.'
Among those duties was allegedly asking him to escort civilians and muster uniformed officers into formation away from the mass.
McWilliams claimed in his suit that he asked Wilson if she was removing him from the color guard because he's not black.
She confirmed that was the case, he said.
Wilson, a 21-year FDNY veteran who was also part of the 9/11 rescue efforts, apparently replaced McWilliams with one of the members of the Vulcan Society.

McWilliams claimed he left the memorial 'to save himself from further shame, humiliation and embarrassment,' as their exchange was overheard by friends and colleagues, the New York Daily News reported.
During her trial testimony, McWilliams' lawyer, Keith Sullivan, asked Loving - who is black - 'So, a request for an all-black color guard is not discriminatory?'
'No, it isn't,' Loving said, according to the New York Post.
Sullivan also asked Loving if it's OK to request an all-black color guard, to which she was quoted as saying, 'Most definitely.'

By way of explanation, Loving said that it was OK to swap out a white person for a black person to 'uplift our identities and our separate ethnicities in order to instill a sense of pride and community and support for one another.'
McWilliams first filed his racial bias complaint with the FDNY in January 2018.
He then filed a lawsuit against Wilson, the FDNY, the city of New York and unnamed individuals in May 2019.
After filing his complaint, Sullivan said that McWilliams was retaliated against and intimidated by Wilson's supporters.
At one point, one of her supporters allegedly laid hands on McWilliams and said: 'I've heard about you, they told me you'd act this way, and now you know me.'
In a brief, Sullivan wrote that rejecting McWilliams from the mass' color guard position was 'deplorable' and a sign of double standards in the fire department.
'If you're black and you discriminate against a white person in the workplace, you get a slap on the wrist at best,' Sullivan wrote.
Wilson, according to the lawsuit, received 'one hour of counseling' over her treatment of McWilliams.
Meanwhile, a white person who discriminates against a person of color receives 'heavy-handed discipline and punishment,' Sullivan wrote.

'The FDNY has created a policy and procedure for bending over backwards, coming up with excuses and accommodating members of the Vulcan Society ... who commit racist acts, and it has to stop,' Sullivan also wrote.
Wani jami'in hukiumar kashe gobara ta birnin New York FDNY, ya ce'babu makawa' daidai ne a cire ma'aikacin kashe gobara farar fata daga faretin gabatar da laumin hukumar

Jami'an kula da banbancin na hukumar kasha gobara ta birnin New York FDNY ya ce tabbas hakkan daidaine a cire mai aikin kashe gobara farar fata daga faretin bikin gabatar da launukan hukumar don kawai a bar bakaken fata zalla ma'aikata don gudabar da faretin, a cewar wani sabon rahoto.

A wani ma'aikacin kashe gobara farar fata mai suna Laftanar Daniel Mc Williams ya shigar da kara a kotu a inda ya kalubalanatar wannan nunin wariyar launin fata bayan an cire shi daga bikin faretin tutocin hukumar a watan Nuwamba shekarar 2017 a wani bikin na tunawa da wadanda suka rasa ransu 'yan kungiyar Vulcan ta 'yan kashe gabara bakar fata zalla.

Hakan kuma jami'in kula da banbance-banbance da samar da daidaito, kuma lauya Cecila Loving, ta kare wannan mataki da a wata shari'ar da a ke yi a bangarren kula da hakkin bil adama na yankin jiha a birnin New York, a a wani rahoton da jaridar New York Post ta yi.

Mc Williams na daya daga cikin masu aikin kashe gobara uku a FDNY a wani hoto na tarihi da suke rike da tutar Amurka a inda so dogayen binayen nan suka ruguje bayan harin ta'addanci da ka kai na 9/11.

A cewar takaradar koken da Mc Willaims ya shigar, ya ce ya na daga cikin wadanda bangaren sshiryta bukukuwa na hukumar kashe gibara ta FDNY ta zaba da za su rike tita a bikin faretin gabatar da launukanta a bikin tunawa da wadanda su ka mutu.
Kasancewa daya daga cikin wadanda ke rike da tuta a wurin bikin 'bakaramin abin alfahari ba ne' ga Mc Williams, a cikin karar da ya shigar, kamar yadda gidan talbijin na CNN ta ba da labari.

A lokacin da ya zo wurin bikin, Sai a ka hana Mc Willaims shiga bikin faretin gabatar da launuka wanda tsohon shugaban Vulcan din Regina Wilson ta yi, saboda ta bukaci bakaken fata ne zalla su kasance masu dauke da tutocin a faretin tunawa da wadanda suka mutu din.
Sannan sai ta tambayi McWilliams dan shekara 29 da haihuwa tsohom ma'aikacin FDNY da je ya taimaka mata wani aikin da daban.'
Cikina ayyukan da ta ya ce ta sa shi shine matsara da farar huka daga in da suke a wurin bikin da kuma shirya 'yan uwansa maus damara da cikin tsarin da ya dace kuma a nrsa daga wurin bikin.
MC Willams ya kuma e a cikin takaradar karara da ya shigar aya akotu ya tambaye ta ko ceacire shin da aka yi daga cikin maus fareti na da alaka da kasancerwarsa shi baki ne.
Jami'ar ta amsa da cewa Eh, haka ne. A cewar sa.

Wani mai suna Wilson dan shekara 21 da haihuwa kuma mai aikin kashe gobara wanda shi ma da shi aka fafafata a ceton masifar da ta faru na 9/11, shi ya samar da wanda ya canji Mc wiliams daga cikin 'ya 'yan kungiyar sauran mazan jiya na Vulcan.

Mc Willams ya kuma ce ta bar wurin bikin ne saboda ya kasa jure wannan wulkancin da cin zarafi da kum cin mutunci' Saboda duk sa-in-sar da suka yi a wurin 'yan uwa da sauran abokan aiki duk suna ji, arahoton JaridarNew York Daily News.

A yayin zamana sauraron karar, Lauyar wanda ya shigarv kara Mc Willaims Keith Sullivan, ta tambayi Lovin - shin wanene bakar fata - don haka shin bukatar da a yi fareti da bakaken fata zalla ba nuna wariya ba ne?'
'A'a ba haka ba ne, Lovon ta ce, a wani rahoto na jaridar New York Post.
Sullivan ta kuma tambayi Loving shin ko yayi daidai da a samar da farenti na bakaken fata zalla bukatar da ta ce 'kwarai da aniya'

A cikin bayaninta, Loving ta ce ba laifi bane a sauya farara fata da bakar fata don kawai a fito da martabar banbance-bancenmu da kuma harsunanmu na asali don kawai a samar da yarda da junma da kawaciyara hankali da kuma taimakon juna a unguwanninmu'
Mc Williams ya dai shigar da kokensa ne kan nuna wariyar da aka yi masa a FDNY ne a cikin watan Janairun 2018.
Daga baya kuma ya shigar da karar Wilsos da kuma Hkumara FDNY da Hukumar kula da birnin New York da kuwa wasu mutanen da ba a bayyana ba a watan Mayu na 2019.
Bayan shigar da koken na sa ne, Sullivan ya ce Mc Willaims ya soma fuskantar barazana da kuma takura daga magoya bayan Wilson.
Har sai da kai a wani lokaci daya daga cikin magoya bayana Wilson ya daga kafadar Mv Willaims ya na mai ce masa 'na samu larin game da kai, na kuma abinda ka aikata, yanzu dai ka shida ni.'
A cikin jawabinsa na shigara da kara Mc Williams ya rubuta cewa, cire shi da aka yi daga faretin abin 'kyama ne' kuma wata alama ce ta munafirci a wannan hukumar kashe gobara.
' Idan kai bakar fata ne ka kuma nuna wariya ga fara fata a wurin aiki, tsananin abin da za a yi maka shi ne a dan zungure a hannu.' haka Sullivan ya rabuta.
Wilson a cewar takardara shigar da karar, 'an zaunar da iita an bata shawarwari na awa guda' kan irin abin da ta yiwa Mc Williams.
A daya bangaren kuma, idan farar fata ne ya nunawa bakara fatar wariyar launin fata 'a kan ja masa kunne, da kuma horo da ladabtarwa mai tsanani' a cewar Sullivan a rubutun da ya yi.

'HukumarFDNY ta kirkirarawa kanta wani tsarin karkatar da doka tare da bayar da uzururruka marasa tushe wajen kawar da kai ga irin abin da 'yan kungiyar Vulcan-wdanda ke aikata wasu aiyyuka na nuna wariyar launin fata, kuma dole ne a taka mu us birki haka', Sullivan ya kuma rubuta.
Serbia seeks more warplanes amid Balkan tensions
BELGRADE, Serbia (AP) - Serbia will strengthen its armed forces and is seeking to purchase more warplanes amid simmering tensions in the Balkans, the Serbian president said Sunday.

President Aleksandar Vucic said "certain initiatives" have been made to buy a fleet of fighter-bombers, accusing the U.S. and other Western countries of arming Serbia's NATO neighbors and its breakaway former province of Kosovo.
"The Americans, Turks and Germans are taking care of their beloved child," Vucic said, referring to Kosovo.
He said the U.S. has recently delivered a number of armored vehicles to Kosovo's security forces.
During a tour of a Serbian army tank brigade, Vucic said his country cannot compete with "NATO donations" to its neighbors when it comes to weapons, "therefore we must do it alone."
Vucic did not specify what type of warplanes Serbia plans to buy, but the pro-government media said his government has officially asked the U.S. for the delivery of 20 fighter-bombers.
The reports said Washington has not yet responded to Belgrade's request and that in case of a refusal, it is likely to purchase Russian-made Sukhoi-25 attack aircraft.
Serbia, which claims military neutrality, has recently received a sophisticated anti-aircraft system from Russia, which has also provided fighter jets, attack helicopters and armored vehicles.
Another Serbian ally, China, has delivered military drones.

U.S. officials have in the past spoken openly about introducing sanctions against Serbia if Moscow sends more arms to the country, especially those that could jeopardize the security of neighboring NATO-member states.
The Russian and Chinese arming of Serbia is being watched with unease in the West and among Serbia's neighbors.
Tensions are growing in the Balkans, which went through a devastating civil war in the 1990s.
NATO intervened in Serbia to stop a bloody Serb crackdown against Kosovo Albanian separatists in 1999.
Despite formally seeking to join the European Union, Serbia's populist leadership has further strengthened close political and military ties with the Kremlin, as well as Beijing.
Serbia, as well as Russia and China, don't accept Kosovo's independence, which is recognized by the U.S. and most of the West.
Kasar Serbiya ta nemi karin jiragen saman yaki a tsaka da tashin hankali na Balkan
BELGRADE, Serbia (AP) - Serbia za ta karfafi sojojinta kuma yayin da ta ke neman ta sayo karin jiragen yaki ana tsaka da tsananin tashin hankali a cewar shugabana kasar ta Serbia a ranar Lahadi.

Shugaba Aleksandar Vucic ya ce "wasu matakai" a cikin bin su domin a sayo wasu jerin jiragen saman yaki samfurin fighters bomber, ta na zargin Amurka da kuma wasu kasashen yamma da ba kasar Serbia wacce ta ke makwabciyar kungiyar NATO wacce ta balle daga tsohuwar lardin Kosovo.
"Amurkawa da Turkawa da kuma Jamusawa suna kokarin kulawa da 'ya 'yansu abin masonsu " in ji Vucic, yana nufin Kosovo.
Ya ce yana Amurka a kwanan nan ta kai wa sojojon Kosovo motoci masu sulke masu yawa.

A yayin da ya ke ziyarar rundunar sojojojin yakin motocin sulke, Vucic ya ce kasarsa ba za ta iya gasa da makwabtanta ba da ake yi"kyautar da kungiyar NATO ba ta fuskar makamai", don haka dole ne mu yi mu kadai da kanmu."

Vucic bai fada takaimaimai irin jiragen saman yakin da Serbia ta ke da shirin saya ba. Amma kafofin yada labarai masu goyon bayan gwamanati na cewa gwamnatinsa a hukumance ta bukaci Amurka da ta ba su jiragen saman yaki guda 20 samfurin fighters-Bombers.
Rahotanni na cewa Washington ba ta ce komai ba dangane da bukatar ta Belgrade in kuma ta ki, toh, da akwai da yiwuwar za ta sayi jiragen na yaki guda 25 na kasar Russia samfurin Sukhoi na kai hari.

Kasar Serbia, wacce ta yi ikirarin matsayi 'yar baruwanmu ta fuskar soji, a baya-bayan nan ta karbi wasu na'urori na zamani da kakkabo jiragen sanman yaki daga Russia, wacce kuma ta bata jiragen yaki, da jiragen saman masu saukar ungulu na kai hari da kuma motoci masu sulke.
Wata kawar Serbia, China ta kai mata taimakon jirage masu sarrafa kansu na soji.

Jami'an Amurka a baya sun yi magana a bayyane akan kakabawa Serbia takunkumi idan Mascow ta sake aika mata da karin wasu makamai, musamman wadanda za su iya jefa harkar tsaron kasashen NATO mai makwabtaka cin hadari.
Kasashen yamma da kuma wasu makwabtan Serbia na kallon samar da makaman da kasar China da Russia ke yi da faraba.
Hankula na kara tashi yankin na Balkan, wacce ta ke farfadowa daga wani kazamin yakin basasa a shekarun 1990.
Kungiyar Tsaro ta NATO ta shiga tsakani a Serbia domin dakatar da yawan zub da jinin Serbi kan 'yan aware Albaniyawa a Kosovo a shekarun 1999.
Duk da cewa ta nemi ta shiga cikin Kungiyar Tarayyar Turai, Shugaban Serbia mai farijn jini ya kara inganta alakar siyasa da sojin kasar da Kremlin da kuma Beijing.
Serbia da Russia da kuma China ba su amince da 'yancin cin gashin kan Kosovo ba, wacce ta samu amincewar Amurka da kuma yawancin kasashen Turai.
History focus can play an important role in reconciliation
Divides have deepened when understanding and healing should be our goals.
Our school system is partly to blame for this failure of knowledge and understanding.
Far too little Australian history is taught.
In fact, without radical action, the only school subject that focuses specifically on our history - "Australian history," at year 12 - will die within the next five years, maybe sooner.
Last year, of 49,324 Victorian students to complete the VCE, only 628, or 1 per cent, did Australian history.
Over the past six years, this figure has been almost halved, with almost 100 fewer students enrolling every year.
A key reason why so few students choose to study Australian history in year 12 is that little has been done in earlier years to fire their passion.
History is not even a standalone learning area, but is subsumed within the broader "humanities."
So across years 7 and 8, students complete only one short unit on ancient "Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples and culture."
Then, in years 9 and 10, there is another unit focusing on Australia during the world wars.
For many Victorian students, that is the sum of Australian history taught across their secondary years.
At years 9 and 10, there is another optional unit covering the period from 1750-1918.
Three actions should urgently be taken to save Australian history in Victorian schools.
First, history must become a standalone learning area like English, maths and science.
Because history is taught only as part of the humanities, it is given little space within the curriculum.
It is also normally taught by humanities generalists who have not studied history themselves.
Historical skills, such as the analysis of evidence, are complex.
We must recruit more specialist history teachers to make sure these are taught in an accessible and exciting way.
Third, the study of Australian history from 1788 to 1914 must become compulsory.
Students love familiarity.
So many of my former students decided against Australian history in year 12 because they would have had to learn the content from scratch.
Knowledge of our history alone will not bridge our deep racial divides.
But without it, as the Victorian curriculum makes clear, the task is hopeless.
Dr Matthew Bach is a Liberal member of the Victorian Parliament and former deputy principal of Ivanhoe Girls" Grammar.
Mayar da hankali kan tarihi na iya taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen sasantawa
Rarrabawa kawuna sun zurfi a lokacin da fahimta da warkarwa ya yakamata su zama manufofinmu.
Tsarin tafi da makarantunmu na daga cikin wani bangare da za mu zarga na wannan gazawar ilmi da fahimta.
Ba a koyar da tarihin kasar Australiya sosai.

A zahiri, ba tare da aiwatar da tsattsauran ra'ayi ba, makarantar ita kadai ta ke mai da hankali kan tarihinmu - "tarihin Australiya," a shekara ta 12 - zai mutu a cikin shekaru biyar masu zuwa, watakila ma kafin wannan lokacin.
A shekarar da ta wuce, a cikin ɗaliban Victoria 49,324 da suka kammala VCE, 628 ne kadai, ko kashi 1, suka yi tarihin Australiya.
A cikin shekaru shida da suka gabata, wannan adadi ya kusan komawa rabi, tare da kusan ɗalibai ɗari ne suke yin rajista a kowace shekara.
Babban dalilin da yasa dalibai kaɗan ne suka zaɓi yin nazarin tarihin Australiya a shekara ta 12 shine ba a yi komai ba a shekarun da suka gabata donza zaburar da sha'awar yin hakan.
Tarihi ba ma wani fage ban ne fannin karatu mai zaman kansa, amma a hade yake a cikin faffadan al'maura na"dan Adam."
Don haka a tsawon shekaru 7 da 8, ɗalibai sun kammala taƙaitaccen sashe ɗaya tak a kan tsohuwar al'adun mutanen Aborigine da mazauna tsibirin Torres."
Sannnan a wasu shekaru 9 da 10, da akwai kuma wani bangare mai mayar da hankali kan kasar Australiya a lokacin yake-yaken duniya.
Ga yawancin daliban Victoria, wannan shine jimillar tarihin Australiya da ake koyarwa a daukacin a shekarun su na karatun Sakandare.
A shekaru 9 da 10, da akwai wani zabi na wani sashe da ya tattaro tun daga shekarun 1750 zuwa 1918.
Wasu abubuwa guda uku na da bukatar a yi aiki domin ceto tarihin a Australiya a makarantun Victorian.
Da farko a mayar da tarihi ya zama bangaren ilimi mai zaman kansa kamar Ingilishi da Liassafi da kuma kimiyya.
Saboda ana koyar da tarihi kawai a cikin abubuwa na dan adam, an bashi takaittcen gurbi a cikin tsarin mahajjar karatu.
Haka nan a ko dayaushe ana koyar da shi ta hanyar masu nazarin dan adam gama gari waɗanda su ba suyi karatun tarihi ba da kansu.
Kwarewa nazarin tarihi kamar nazarin shaidu, suna da rikitarwa.
Dole ne mu sake daukar kwararrun malaman tarihi don tabbatar da cewa ana koyar da su ta hanya mai sauki da kuma ban sha'awa.
Na uku, nazarin tarihin Australiya daga shekarar 1788 zuwa 1914 dole ne ya zama tilas.
Dalibai suna son abin da suka sabawa.
Da yawa daga tsoffin ɗalibaina sun yanke hukunci cewa ba za su yi tarihin Australiya a shekara ta 12 saboda da sai sun koyi abubuwan da ke ciki tun daga farko.
Sanin tarihinmu kadai ba zai dinke bambancin launin fatarmu ba da ta suka yi zurfi.
Amma ba tare da shi ba, kamar yadda tsarin karatun Victoria ya fito da shi karara, aikin ba zai yiwu.
Dr. Matthew Bach Dan Majalisar Dokokin Victoria ne kuma tsohon sassaucin ra'ayi, kuma mataimakin shugaban makarantar Ivanhoe Girls" Grammar ne.
Will Prince Andrew be named in new sex dossier?
Royal prepares to fight back against possible disclosure in court documents about his friendship with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell
US Judge ordered release of secret documents relating to Epstein and Maxwell
The 80 pages of documents contain sections of Maxwell's 2016 testimonies
Release of the pages could also heap pressure on Prince Andrew as they include communications between Maxwell and Epstein from January 2015
Virginia Roberts, an alleged sex slave of the shamed US financier, claimed in 2015 court papers that she was forced to have sex with Prince Andrew

Prince Andrew is preparing to fight back against the possible disclosure this week of further damaging allegations about his friendship with paedophile Jeffrey Epstein and alleged accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell.
US District Judge Loretta Preska last week ordered the release of 80 secret legal documents, running to hundreds of pages, relating to Maxwell and Epstein.

The publication of the vast tranche of papers would be a blow for Maxwell, 58, as they feature large sections of testimony she gave to lawyers in 2016, including what her legal team said was "intrusive questioning" about her sex life.

They could also heap pressure on Prince Andrew because one of the documents includes communications between Maxwell and Epstein from January 2015, when Virginia Roberts, an alleged sex slave of the shamed US financier, claimed in court papers that she was forced to have sex with the Prince on three occasions.
Andrew has repeatedly and strenuously denied the claims.
A leaked email from 2015 that was revealed last year by the BBC appears to suggest that Andrew asked for Maxwell's help in dealing with Ms Roberts's claims.
We have no doubt the Duke will be vindicated
In it, he told the socialite: "Let me know when we can talk. Got some specific questions to ask you about Virginia Roberts."
Maxwell replied: "Have some info. Call me when you have a moment."
Last night, a source close to Andrew said: "The Duke of York has done nothing wrong, so we are relaxed about the unsealing of any court documents.
As the US courts have been at pains to point out, just because an allegation is included in court papers does not make them true.
"The US courts have urged the media and public to treat any allegations contained in court papers with extreme caution.
We entirely concur.
We have no doubt the Duke will be completely vindicated in the weeks ahead."
Maxwell is being held in Manhattan's Metropolitan Detention Center awaiting trial for recruiting and grooming some of Epstein's underage victims between 1994 and 1997.
She is also accused of perjury for denying knowledge in legal depositions of his abuse.
She denies all the allegations.
Maxwell was interviewed by lawyers in April and July 2016 as part of a defamation lawsuit brought by Ms Roberts, who now goes by her married surname Giuffre.
About 40 of 418 pages of that testimony were made public last year, but following last week's ruling by Judge Preska in New York, further sections could be unsealed as early as Thursday.
Maxwell's lawyers were given a week to file an appeal.
Epstein was found dead in his New York prison cell last year while he was awaiting trial for sex offences.
Shin ko yarima Andrew zai shiga cikin jerin masu abin kunyar neman mata?
Masarauta na shirin mayar da martani kan wata yiwuwar bankada da ake shirin yi a bisa wasu takardu na Kotu kan samartakansa da Jeffery Epstein da Ghislaine Maxwell
Wani alkali a Amurka ya bayar da umarnin bayyana wasu takardu na sirri da suka danganci Epstein da kuma Maxwell
Takardun masu shafi 80 na dauke da sassa na shaidar da Maxwell ya bayar a shekarar 2016
Fito da takardun a na iya sa Yarima Andrew cikin matsin lamba saboda suna dauke da wasu wasiku tsakanin Maxwell da Epstien daga watan Janairu 2015
Virginia Roberts wacce a ke zargin dadiron attajiri mai abin kunyar nan, ta yi ikirarin cewa a shekarar 2015 a cikin takardun na Kotu cewa, an tilasta mata yin jama'i da yarima Andrew

Yarima ya yi shirin yakar yiwuwar sakin wadannan bayanai a wannan mako na jerin tonon asiri masu zub da mutunci game da alakarsa da mai lalata da yara kanana Jeffery Eptein da kuma wanda ake zargin suna tare Ghislain Maxwell.

Alkalin wata Kotu a Amurka Loretta Preska a makon da ya wuce ta bayar da umarnin fitar da takardun na sirri masu shafuka 80 na sharia, wadanda suka kai shafuka ɗari masu alaka da Maxwell da kuma Epstein.

Wallafa wadannan takardu zai zama wani babban nakasu ga Maxwell dan shekara 58, domin sun kunshi wasu sassa masu yawa na shaidar da ta bayar ga lauyoyi a shekarar 2016, ciki har da abin da nata lauyoyin suka kira "tambayoyin kwakwa" kan rayuwar jam'inta.

Hakan kuma zai iya kai wa ga matsin lamba kan Yarima Andrew saboda daya daga cikin takaradun ya kunshi wasiku tsakanin Maxwell da Epstein tun daga watan Janairun shekarar 2015 a lokacin da Virgina Roberts wata dadiron da ake zargi ta attajiri mai abin kunya, a ikirarin da ta yi kamar yadda ya kunsa a cikin takardun na Kotu cewa an tilasta mata yin jima'i da Yarima a lokuta daban-daban har sau uku.
Yariman ya tsaya kai da fata, a kuma lokuta da yawa ya karyata wannan ikirarin.
A wata wasika ta emel da aka tsegunta ta a shekarar 2015 wacce kuma BBC ta yada, na nuna cewe Andrew ya nemi taimakon Maxwell kan yadda zai yi da ikirarin da Virginia Roberts yi game da shi.
Ba ma tantanma cewa gaskiyar Yariman mai rike da sarautar Duke za ta bayyana
A cikin ta, yana mai harkar shakatawa na jama'a: "Ka sanar dani lokacin da za mu yi magana. Ina da wasu tambayoyi ne da na ke so zan yi maka kan Virginia Roberts."
Maxwell ya amsa da cewa: "Ina da wasu bayanai. Ka kira ni a duk da ka ke da lokaci."

A daren jiya, a cewar wata majiya da ke kusa da Andrew na mai cewa: Yariman mai sarautar hakimin York ba wani abu da ya yi na Allah wadai, don haka mu babu da wani abu da ya daga mana hankali dangane da sakin wasu takardu na Kotu.
Kamar yadda kotunan Amurka suke ta fama da kokarin nunawa, don kawai an shigar da wani zargi a takardun kotu hakan bai sa zarge-zargen sun zama gaskiya ba.
"Kotunan na Amurka sun yi kira ga kafofin yada labarai da kuma jama'ar gari da su yi matukar taka tsan-tsan da duk wasu zarge-zarge da ke cikin takardun na kotu.
Mu ma mun amince da hakan kacokam.
Mu ba ma haufin cewa gaskiyar yarima zata fito ne kuma za a wanke shi cikin 'yan makonni masu zuwa."

Ana tsare da Maxwell ne a wata cibiyar tsare jama'a ta Manhattan da ke tsakiyar birni, a na tsare da shi ne bisa jiran sharia'a da ya ke yi kan laifin da ake zarginsa da aikatawa na dauka da kuma shirya wasu daga cikin yara masu kananan shekaru da Epstein ya ribato a tsakanin shekarun 1994 da kuma 1997.
An kuma zarge shi da laifin yin shaidar zur da kuma karyar da ta yi na nuna rashin sanin matsayin shari'a kan cin zarafin da yake yi.
Ta musanta duk tuhume-tuhumen da ake yi mata.
Wasu Lauyoyi sun yi hira da ita cikin watan Afrilu da Yuli shekarar 2016 a cikin wani bangare na karar bata suna da Misisi Robert ta shigar, wacce yanzu ta ke amsa sunan mijin da ta aura Giuffre.

Kimanin shafuka 40 cikin adadin shafuka 418 na shaidar da aka bayar aka kuma fito da su baynar jama'a a shekarar da ta wuce, amma bayan yanke hukuncin kotu wacce mai shari'a Preska ta yi a New York, za a iya sakin wasu sassan nan da ranar Alhamis.
An ba Lauyoyin Maxwell mako guda su daukaka kara.
An gano gawar Epstein a dakinsa a gidan yarin da ya ke tsare a New York a shekara da ta wuce, ya mutu yana jiran yanke hukuncin alkali a zarge-zargen da ake yi masa kan laifukan da suka shafi jima'i.
Average US gas price up a penny over 2 weeks to $2.25/gallon
CAMARILLO, Calif. -- The average U.S. price of regular-grade gasoline inched up less than penny over the past two weeks to $2.25 per gallon.
That's 56 cents below the average pump price from a year ago.
Industry analyst Trilby Lundberg of the Lundberg Survey said Sunday it's the smallest rise in prices seen since late April.
She said crude oil prices have remained stable and there's an abundant supply of U.S. gasoline to meet the demand.
Nationwide, the highest average price for regular-grade gas is in the San Francisco Bay Area at $3.27 per gallon.
The lowest average is in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, at $1.79 per gallon.
The average price of diesel in the survey taken Friday held steady from two weeks earlier at $2.54 a gallon.

Mai nazari a harkar Trilby Lunderberg Survey yana mai cewe a ranar Lahadi, a wannan shine kari mafi kankanta da aka gani tuna watan Afrilu.
Tana mai cewa farashin danyen mai sun kasance a wuri daya ga kuma wadataccen mai da ake samar da shi a Amurka domin cimma bukatar 'yan kasa.
A kasar baki daya, mafi kololuwar abin da za a biya na manfetur shine a birnin San Francisco sashin bakin teku a farashin $3. 27 a gallan daya
Mafi karanci a farashi kuwa shinne Baton Rouge, a Lousiana a farashin $2.79 a gallan daya.
