Father-Son Arrested With Heroin Worth Rs 1.54 Crore In Mizoram
The heroin, worth around Rs 1.55 crore in the local market, was smuggled from Myanmar: Cops
A man and his son were arrested with 1.9 kg heroin in Mizoram's Hnahthial district near the Myanmar border, the police said on Sunday.
The heroin, worth around Rs 1.55 crore in the local market, was smuggled from Myanmar, they said.
Duhkima (62) and his son Remthangpuia (33) were arrested with the drugs on Friday night from Ngharchhip village, the police said.
They also dropped about Rs 280 grams of heroin, worth Rs 15 lakh, while swimming across a river as they tried to flee from the police, officials said.
According to police, the seizure was believed to be the biggest heroin haul in the state.
The accused were charged under the relevant sections of the Narcotic Drugs & Psychotropic Substances (NDPS) Act, 1985.
Even as the inter-state borders and the one with Myanmar remained sealed in the wake of the coronavirus outbreak, smuggling of drugs and other contrabands continued unabated, the police sources said.
The Assam Rifles recently seized 25 trucks loaded with betel nuts, valued at Rs 4 crore, being smuggled from Myanmar, they said.
An Kama Uba da dansa da tabar Heroin da darajarsu ta kai Rs 1.54 a Mizoram
Tabar Heroin, wacce darajarta ta kai Rs 1.55 a cikin kasuwar cikin gida, an yi sumoga dinta ne daga Myanmar: Cops
An kama wani mutum da dansa da tabar heroin mai nauyin kilogiram 1.9 a gundumar Hnahthial da ke Mizoram kusa da kan iyakar Myanmar, in ji ‘yan sanda ranar Lahadi.
Tabar ta heroin din, ta kai kimanin Rs 1.55 a kasuwar cikin gida, an shigo da ita ne daga Myanmar, in ji su.
'Yan sanda sun ce an kama Duhkima (62) da dansa Remthangpuia (33) tare da tabar a daren Juma'a daga kauyen Ngharchhip.
Jami'ai sun ce sun kuma yar da kimanin giram 280 na tabar, wanda ya kai Rs 15 dubu daria, yayin da suke iyo a cikin kogi yayin da suke kokarin tserewa daga 'yan sanda.
A cewar 'yan sanda, wannan kamun ta yi amannar cewa shine babbar wanda kuma ba a taba irinsa ba a kamen da ake yi a jihar.
Za a tuhumi wadanda ake zargin ne a karkashin sassan Dokar Abubuwan sa maye da kuma abubuwa masu gusar da hankali (NDPS) ta shekarar 1985.

Duk da cewa iyakokin tsakanin jihohin da wanda ke Myanmar sun kasance a kulle sakamakon barkewar annobar kwayar coronavirus, an ci gaba da shigo da muggan kwayoyi da sauran haramtattun kayayyaki ba kakkautawa, in ji majiyar ‘yan sanda.
A kwanan nan ne kungiyar tsaro ta Assam Riffles suka kama wasu manyan motoci guda 25 cike da goro, wadanda darajarsu ta kai Rs 4, ana fasa kwabrinsu daga Myanmar, in ji su.
Sachin Pilot Vs Ashok Gehlot; BJP Says State In Political Crisis; Congress Wants Floor Test
Ashok Gehlot said if necessary, Congress hold a sit-in outside the prime minister's home.

A day after leading a dharna at the Raj Bhawan in Jaipur, Rajasthan Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot on Saturday said if necessary, the Congress MLAs will meet the President and hold a sit-in outside the prime minister's residence to settle the crisis in the state.

At a meeting of the Congress Legislature Party (CLP), Mr Gehlot indicated that the plan was to have a floor test to prove that the majority of Congress MLAs and allies are with him in the tussle for power.
"He said the government has the majority and wants to go to the assembly floor," a statement issued by Congress chief whip Mahesh Joshi after the CLP meeting said.
The CLP meeting was held at the hotel where the MLAs in the Gehlot camp are holed up for days.
"The chief minister asked us to remain prepared to stay longer at the hotel.
If required, he said, we would go to meet the President and would also hold a dharna outside the prime minister's residence," a party leader said.

The Rajasthan Governor must call an assembly session to let the Congress prove its majority, party leader Rahul Gandhi on Friday said, alleging that the BJP's conspiracy to topple the Ashok Gehlot government was now clear.
"The country is ruled in accordance with the law and constitution.
Governments are formed and run based on people's mandate.
BJP's conspiracy to topple the Rajasthan government is clear.
This is an insult to 8 crore people of Rajasthan.
The governor must call assembly session so that the truth comes before the country," Mr Gandhi tweeted in Hindi.

Rajasthan Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot told Congress MLAs on Saturday that he was ready to go to the President of India to make sure that what he calls a "BJP conspiracy" to stall a test of strength does not succeed.

Mr Gehlot, who protested for hours at Governor Kalraj Mishra's home on Friday to press for an assembly session, held meetings with Congress MLAs and his cabinet on Saturday, after which a fresh proposal was drawn up and passed by the cabinet.
Mr Mishra had last night asked Mr Gehlot to re-submit the request for an assembly session, citing six objections.
This proposal will be sent to the Governor soon.
Mr Gehlot has accused the Governor of delaying the session because he is "under pressure" to stall his government's test of strength.

As Mr Gehlot met with his cabinet, a BJP delegation led by Rajasthan BJP leader Satish Poonia and Leader of Opposition Gulab Chandra Kataria met the Governor to discuss the COVID-19 situation in the state.
Karo tsakanin Sachin Pilot da Ashok Gehlot; BIP ya ce jihar ta shiga hargitsin siyasa: Majalis ta ja daga ja daga kan gwaji a baynar jama'a.
Ashok Gehlot ya ce idan ta zama dole, Majalisa za ta yi zaman dirshan a kofar gidan Firayi minsta

Hakan ya zo ne bayan da jagorartara wani wasan kwaikwayo a Raj Bhavan a Jaipur, Babban minista Ashok Gehlot a ranr Asabar yana mai cewa idan ya zama dole, 'yna majlisar baki dayansu za za su gana da shugaban kasa su kuma yi zaman dirsshan a kofara godan Firayi mistnista domin a magnace matsalar siyasar jihar.

A wani taro na jam'iyyar Congres Legislatiyre Party CLP, Mista Gehlot ya nuna cewa burinsu sihine su na 'yar kashi a zauren majalisar domin su nunwa cewa sauran 'yan majalisar da magoya bayansu na tare da shi a wannan fada da ake yi na nuna iko.

"ya na mai cewa gwamnati ita ta ke da rinjaye kuma ta ke son gwada kwanjinta a zauren majalisa", a wata sanarwa da shugaban masu tsawatarwa na majalisa Manesh Jishi ya fitar bayan wani taron na jam'iyyar CLP ya ce
An yi taron jam'iyyar na CLP ne a wani otal din da 'yan majalisar na bagaren Gehlot suke boya na kwana da kawanaki.
"babbaan ministan ya nememuu da mu zama cikin shirin cigaba da zama a otal din na sai baba ta gani.
idan har bukatar haka ta tas, a cewarsa, za mu je mu gana da shugaban kasa sannan mu yi zaman dirshan a kofar gidan Firayi Minista," Shugabann jam'iyyar ya ce.

Dole ne Gwamnan Rajasthan ya kira wani zaman majalisa domin ya bari majalisa ta tabbatarwa da rinjayenta, shugaban jam'iyyar Rahul Gandhi ya fada a ranar Juma'a, yana mai zargin hadin bakin BIp na kokarin kifar da gwamnatin Ashol Gehlot ya fito karara
Wannan kasa ana milkinta ne bisa tsarin mulki ba kuma doka da oda
Ana kafa gwamnati ne a kuma gudannar da ita a bisa bukatun jama'a.
Hadin bakin na kokarin kifar da gwamnatin Rajasthan ya fito karara
Wannan kuma wani cin fuska ne ga mutanen 8 'yan asalin Rajasthan.
Don hka dole ne gwamna ya kira zaman majalisa a inda gaskiya za ta bayyana a gaban kowa da kowa a wannan kasa" Mista Gandhi ya aika ta sakon Tuwita a harshen Hindi.

Babban minista Ashok Gehlot ya fadawa 'yan jam'iyyar Congress a majalisa a ranar Asabafr cewa a shirye ya ke ya je ya sami shugaban kasar Indiya domin ya tabbatar da cewa abin da ya kira "hadin baki" don gwada karfin a majalisa bai ci nasara ba.

Mista Gehlot, wanda ya gudanar da zanga-zangar na awowi a gidan Gwamna Kalraj Mishra a ranar Juma'a, don matsa lamba don yin babban taro ranar Asabar daga bisani aka bada sabuwar bukatar da gida suka amince da ita.
Mista Mishra a daren jiya ya tambayi Mista Gehlot da ya sake mika bukatarsa ta neman a kira majalisa ta zauna, yana mai lissafa wassu dalilai guda shida na kin amincewa da haka
Wannan bukatar zaman za a aikata zuwa ga gwamana nan ba da jimawa ba.
Mista Gehlot ya zargi gwamna da jan kafa kan zaman majalisar saboda "ya na cikin matsin lamba" ya dakile nuna karfin nuna ikon gwamnati.

Kamar yadda Mista Gehlot ya hadu da 'yan majalisar zartarwansa, wata tawaga ta jam'iyyar BIP a karkashin shugabanta na Rajasthan Satish Poonia da kuma shugaban 'yan adawa Gulab Chandra Katria sun gana da gwamna don tattauna matsalar cutar COVID-19 a jihar.
Poland to withdraw from European treaty aimed at preventing violence towards women
Poland's right-wing government says it will withdraw from a European treaty aimed at preventing violence against women.

The Istanbul Convention is the world's first binding instrument to prevent violence against women but the Polish Justice Minister, Zbigniew Ziobro, described the text as "harmful" because it requires that schools teach children about gender from a sociological point of view.
Ziobro said over the weekend that on Monday he will begin preparing the formal process to withdraw from the treaty.

"This ideological element is linked to the imperative to change education in schools and outside of school programs, in terms of learning, attitudes, convictions of the young Polish generation of students to make, in our opinion, the false assumption that biological sex is archaic, and in fact everything comes down to the socio-cultural gender."
In Ziobro's opinion, the convention's articles concerning the education of children and young people as well as family relationships in the LGBT context are not acceptable.
"We also reject the LGBT element of promoting family relationships, a view propagated by activists from left-wing or homosexual circles who want to translate their beliefs into binding law," he said.
The Council of Europe said on Sunday it is "alarmed" that Poland is aiming to withdraw from the Convention.

In Warsaw on Friday, around 2,000 people including women's groups and other rights activists held a demonstration in front of the offices of Ordo Luris, a right-wing organisation that supports withdrawal from the convention.
"We will not be victims" they chanted.
Demonstrations were also held in other Polish cities.
Poland signed the Istanbul Convention for the prevention and combating of violence against women and domestic violence in December 2012 and ratified it in 2015.
Kasar Poland za ta fice daga yarjejeniyar Turai da ke nufin hana cin zarafin mata
Gwamnatin Poland mai sassaucin ra'ayi ta ce za ta janye daga yarjejeniyar Turai dake kokarin hana cin zarafin mata.

Yarjejeniyar ta Santanbul ita ce ta farko da kasashen duniya ke shirin aiki da ita kan yadda za a hana cin zarafin mata, amma ministan Shari'a na kasar ta Poland Zbignew Ziobro ya bayyana kudirin da cewa yana da "illa" saboda ya bukaci cewa a koyawa yara game da jinsi daga mahanga ta mu'amilla da ilimin zamantakewar jama'a.
Ziobro ya na mai cewa a karshen mako, ranar Litinin zai fara shirye-shiryen bin matakai da ka'idojin janyewa daga yarjejeniyar.

"Wannan bangare na akida yana da nasaba da wajibcin canza ilimi a makarantu da wajen shirye-shiryen makarantu, dangane da ilmantarwa, da halaye, da hukuncin da samari 'yan asalin kasar Poland suka yi, a ra'ayinmu, zaton da ake yi na cewa ilimin jima'in halittu na gargajiya ne, kuma a zahiri duk abin da ya bayu ne ga yanayin zamantakewar al'umma da al'adu da kuma jinsi. "

A ra'ayin Ziobro, ƙudurin da a ka zartar da ya shafi ilimintar da yara da matasa da kuma dangantakar iyalai da ke tsakanin masu dabi'ar mata-maza da luwaɗi da maɗigo cikin yanayin zamantakewa, ba za'a yarda da shi ba.

"Haka kuma ba za mu amince da shigar da dabi'ar mata-maza da maza masu neman maza, da mata masu neman mata, wajen yada wannan dabi'a da 'yan rajin kare hakki da kuma 'na luwadi da ke son mayar da akidarsu zama doka kan jama'a", a cewarsa.
A ranar Lahadi Majalisar Turai ta ce ta "kadu" da cewa kasar Poland na janyewa daga yarejeniyar.

A garin Warsaw a ranar Juma'a, kimanin mutane 2,000 ne ciki har da kungiyoyin mata da kuma sauran masu rajin kare hakki ne suka yi wata zanga-zanga a kofar ofishin Ordo Luris, wata kungiyar da ke goyon bayan janyewar kasar daga yarjejeniyar.
"Ba za mu yarda a cucemu ba" Suna ta fada cikin rewa waka.
An kuma gudanar da irin wadannan zanga-zangar a wasu biranen kasar ta Poland.

Kasar Poland na daga cikin kasashen da suka sa hannu a yarjejeniyar da aka kulla a birnin Istanbul kan yaki da cin zarafin mata da kuma fadace-fadace na cikin gida a watan Disambar shekarar 2012 aka kuma zartar da ita a shekarar 2015.
Ex-royal couple 'felt snubbed' in Queen's Christmas speech, new book claims
MEGHAN Markle and Prince Harry "felt snubbed" by his grandmother, The Queen, during her Christmas speech.
The couple's new biography, Finding Freedom, claims they felt left out of the photo collection on show in the festive address.
Pictures on the desk that The Queen was sitting at included Prince William, Kate Middleton and their three children, Prince Charles and his wife Camilla along with Prince Philip.
Yet, Meghan and Harry were nowhere to be seen having welcomed Archie last May - although the youngster did get a mention as Her Majesty's 'eighth great-grandchild'.

The new book - which is set to be released in August - also reveals that Meghan and Kate Middleton "were never friends" as they "struggled to move past distant politeness" and they only met up on a few occasions.
It was claimed yesterday that Prince Harry's split with his brother William started years before his romance with Meghan - and that it came to a head over William's marriage to Kate Middleton.
The Duke of Sussex felt like a "spare part" at events with his brother and Kate Middleton - with it claimed, "long before Meghan he wanted to change things."
Ma'aurata 'yan Jinin sarauta a da, 'su na jin an yi watsi da su' a lokacin gabatar da sakon Krisimeti na sarauniya, a cewar wani littafi
MEGHAN Markle da Yarima Harry suna jin cewa kakakarsa sarauniyar Ingila ta yi "watsi da su" a yayin gabatar da jawabinta na sakon Krisimeti data saba yi duk shekara.

A wani sabon littafin tarihin rayuwar ma'auratan biyu mai suna 'Finding Freedom' sun ikirari cewa an fitar da su daga jerin hotunan da aka baje a taron na sauraron jawabin na al'ada da aka sayi duk shekara.
Hotunan da ke kan teburin da sarauniyar ta ke zaune sun hada da na Yarima William da Kate Middleton da kuma 'ya'yansu uku, yarima da matarsa Camilla da kuma Yarima Philip.
Amma babu su, babu alamar su bayin sun haifi 'yar su Archie a watan Mayu na shekarar da ta wuce. Ko da yake jaririyar ba 'a ko ambace ta ba a matsayin 'tattaba kunnen sarauniya ta takwas'.

Sabon littafin - wanda ake sa ran fitowarsa cikin watan Agusta - ya kuma bayyana cewa Meghan daKate Middleton "ba su taba zama abokan juna ba"a yayin da "suke fama su wuce ladabin nesa" sun dai taba haduwa a wasu lokuta daban-daban.

An yi ikirarin cewa a jiya, rabuwar yarima Harry da dan uwansa William ya samo asali ne 'yan shekaru da suka wuce kafin soma soyayyarsu da Meghan - kuma hakan ya kai makura ne a lokacin da William ya auri Kate Middleton.

Mai rike da sarautar Duke na Sussex ya na jin kansa tamkar "wukar baya"a duk wani taro da dan uwansa William da Kate Middleton za su je - da hakan yayi ikirari, "tun kafin zuwan Meghan ta zo, ya ke so ya sauya abubuwa."
Section Of Jeronimo Open Space Temporarily Closes After 2 Coyote Attacks - CBS Los Angeles
Two people were bit by coyotes near Oso Creek Trail along Jeronimo Road in Mission Viejo Saturday morning, causing a temporary closure at the trail.
Laura Wittmer said she sees coyotes almost every morning when she's running and typically just tries to avoid them, but on Saturday morning, one came directly toward her and bit her on the leg.
As investigations continue into the attacks, the trail has been closed.

The City of Mission Viejo said in a tweet, "Today, 2 different parties reported coyote bites to a human. MV Animal Services is working with the Department of Fish & Wildlife on this matter and a section of Jeronimo Open Space has been closed. Please be aware and vigilant when you are out where wildlife is prevalent."
Wittmer tried to fight the coyote off by hitting it with a water bottle.
She called 911 to get a ride to her car but was able to drive herself to the emergency room.
The coyote disappeared into the hills but officials are hoping to track it down and check it for rabies.
Meantime, Wittmer will undergo rabies treatments as a precaution over the next two weeks.
She said the scary encounter won't stop her from her early morning runs but that from now on, she'll choose a different spot.
The condition of the other coyote bite victim is unclear.
An rufe wani sashi na wani babban filin shakatawa da ke Jeronimo da wasu karnukan daji su biyu suka kai wa mutane hari - daga kafar yada labarai ta CBS a Birnin Los Angeles
Wasu karanukan daji sun ciji mutane biyu a kusa da koramar Oso wacce ta mike ta bi titin Jeronimo da ke Mission Viejo da safiyar Asabar. Wanda hakan ya sa a ka rufe wurin.

Laura Wittmer ta ce ta kan ga wadannan karnukan daji kusan a kowacce safiya idan ta fito gudun motsa jiki kuma ta kan kauce musu, anma a wannan ranar Asabar, kawai sai daya daga cikinsu ya nunfota gadan-gadan ya kuma cijeta a kafa.
Yayin da a ka cigaba da bincike kan lamarin, an rufe wurin.

A wani sako a shafinta na dandalin sada zumunta na Twitter hukumar birnin Mission Viejo ta ce, "yau wasu mutane 2 sun kawo rahoton bullar wasu karnukan daji da suka ciji mutane. Hukumar kula da dabbobi na birnin na aiki tare da sashen kula da kifaye da dabbobin daji kan wannan batu, an kuma rufe wani sashi na babban filin shakatawa na Jeronimo. Ana kiran jama'a da su kiyaye, su kuma yi taka tsan-tsan a duk lokacin da suka fita zuwa wuraren a ke da dabbobin daji."
Wittmer ta yi kokarin korar karen dajin ta hanyar dukansa da robar ruwa.
Ta kuma kira lambar 911 don samu agajin abin hawa, amma sai ga shi ta iya tuka kanta har zuwa wurin da ake bayar da agajin gaggawa.
Karnukan dajin sun gudu tare da buya a cikin 'yan tsaunukan da ke wurin, amma jam'ai na kokarin bin sawun su tare da kama su don su gudanar da bincike ko suna da ciwon hauka.
Duk da haka, za a yiwa Wittmer maganin kamuwa daga ciwon hauka na mako biyu a matsayin rigakafi.

Wittmer ta kuma ce, harin da wadannan dabbobin daji suka kai mata ya tsorata ta amma hakan ba zai sa ta daina fita gudun motsa jikin da ke yi ba a kowacce safiya, sai dai kawai za ta sauya wani wuri ne.
Sai dai ba a san halin da daya mutumin da wadannan karnukan daji suka ciza ya ke ciki ba.
50 People To Be Allowed In Mosques On Eid, No Mass Prayers In Eidgah: Karnataka
Eid-ul-Azha, also known as Bakrid, would be celebrated on July 31 and August 1.

The Karnataka government has allowed Eid-ul-Azha prayers only in mosques with a maximum of 50 people at a time and said mass prayers at Eidgah and other places are prohibited in view of the coronavirus pandemic.
People visiting mosques for the prayers have to wear face masks and maintain social distancing, Minority Welfare and Wakf Department Secretary AB Ibrahim said in an order.

It said the Hilal committee has decided that the Eid-ul- Azha, also known as Bakrid, would be celebrated on July 31 in Udupi, Dakshina Kannada and Kodagu districts while it would be on August 1 in the rest of the state.
Noting that mass prayers were one of the important rituals Muslims perform during Bakrid, the order said in view of the COVID-19 pandemic such events at Eidgah and other places were prohibited.
However, prayers would be allowed in mosques with the restriction that not more than 50 people should take part.
If there were more people, the prayers should be performed in batches, the department said in the order.
Mass prayers should not be performed in any other places such as halls, community buildings and "Shadi Mahal," the order added.
Karnataka allowed temples, mosques and other places of worship to be open for devotees from June 8 with all COVID-19 preventive measures in place.
Mutum 50 ne za'a basu Izini shiga Masallatan a Karnataka a ranar Idi, Babu taron jama'a a ranar Sallar
Sallar idin Layya wacce ake kira Bakrid za a yi ta ne a ranakun 31 ga watan Yuli da kuma ranar 1 ga watan Agusta.

Gwamnatin Karnataka ta kyalle gudanar da Sallar idin Layya kadai a masalltan da yawan jama'ar bai wuce mutane 50 ba a lokaci guda ta kuma ce yin sallar jam'i a Eidgha ya haramta sakamakon barkewar annobar cutar Koronabirus.
Mutanen da ke zuwa masallatai don yin sallah a jam'i sai sun sa takunkumi sun kuma nisanci juna a sahun, a cewar AB Ibrahim Sakataren Sashen Kula da Walwala da waƙafi a wata doka.

Dokar ta kuma ce Kwamitin halal ya zartar da cewa Sallar Idin Layya wacce ake kira da Bakrid za yi ta ne a ranar 31 ga watan Yuli a gudundumin Udupi, da Dakshina, da Kannada da kuma Kodagu yayin da za a yi idin ne a ranar 1 ga watan Agusta a sauran jihohin.
La'akari da cewa sallar jam'i na da daya daga cikin muhimman ibadun da Musulmi ke yi a bikin Bakrid, dokar ta ce la'akari da bullar annobar cutar COVID 19.
Sai dai za a kyale yin Sallah a masallacin da jama'ar cikinsa ba su wuce sama da mutum 50 ba.
Idan yawansu ya fi haka sai dai su Sallar rukuni-rukuni. in ji hukumar a cikin dokar da ta bayar.
Ba kuma za a yi sallat a wasu wurare ba kamar dakunan taro da ire-irensu da kuma "Shadi-mahad" a cewar dokar.
Karnataka ta kyale masu zuwa bauta a sauran wasu wuraren ibada da za a iya budewa ga mabiya wadannan addinai daga ranar 8 ga watan Yuni tar da daukan dukkanin matakai na kariya akan COVID-19.
Heart attack: Eating chocolate once a week may reduce risk of the deadly condition
New research has pinpointed a certain indulgence may be good for the heart muscle.
What is it? And how would it reduce the chances of a heart attack?
Researchers conducted a meta-analysis spanning five decades looking into coronary heart disease (CHD).
CHD - that also goes by the name of ischaemic heart disease - has three main symptoms: chest pain (angina), heart attacks and heart failure.
Other symptoms of the disease can include heart palpitations and unusual breathlessness.
"Chocolate contains heart-healthy nutrients such as flavonoids, methylxanthines, polyphenols and stearic acid which may reduce inflammation and increase good cholesterol."
Good cholesterol, otherwise known as high-density lipoprotein (HDL), collects "bad" cholesterol - the kind that furs up the heart's arteries - and transports it to the liver.
In the liver, "bad" (low-density lipoprotein) cholesterol is broken down and excreted from the body.
However, the new study doesn't examine portion sizes, or the type of chocolate enjoyed.
It's not clear whether the participants ate dark chocolate, milk chocolate or some other cocoa confectionery.
The findings were based on previous research that concluded that consuming cocoa (found in chocolate) reduced the risk of a heart attack.
It's believed by scientists the flavonoids found in chocolate lower blood pressure and improve vascular function.
Vascular function refers to how effectively the blood delivers oxygen and nutrients throughout the body and carries away waste material.
In regards to the new research, lifestyle factors weren't highlighted in the results.
Dr Alice Lichtenstein commented on the data, suggesting that those who admitted to eating chocolate may be more likely to have "a healthy body weight."
She added that they could "regularly engage" in physical exercise and be "less stressed."
She continued: "Each factor could independently impact on cardiovascular health."
Ciwon zuciya: Cin cakulan sau ɗaya a mako na iya rage haɗarin fadawa cikin wannan mummunan matsayi
Wani sabon bincike ya yi nuni na hakika cewa soma wannan dabia na iya zama mai kyau ga tsokar zuciya.
Menene shi? Kuma ta yaya za ta iya rage yiwuwar hadarin kamuwa da ciwon zuciya?
Masu bincike sun gudanar da wasu bincike-bincike da nazari na tsawon sama da shekaru biyar suna duban cututtukan da suka shafi kahon zuciya (CHD).
CHD - wannan kuma ana kiranta da sunan cututtukan zuciya na ischemic - yana da manyan alamomi guda uku: ciwon kirji (angina), bugun zuciya da gazawar zuciya.
Sauran alamun cutar na iya haɗawa da bugun zuciya da kuma rashin numfashi mai ban mamaki.
"Cakuleti na dauke da sinadaran da ke samar da lafiyar zuciya kamar flavonoids, da methylxanthines, da polyphenols da kuma stearic acid wanda ka iya rage kumburi da kuma kara kyastarol mai kyau. "
Kyakkyawan cholesterol, da aka san shi da babban nauyi na lipoprotein (HDL), yana tattara “mummunan” cholesterol - nau'in da ke buɗe jijiyoyin zuciya - kuma ya ɗauke shi zuwa hanta.
A cikin hanta, "mummunan" (low-density lipoprotein) cholesterol yana narkewa sannan kuma ya fita daga jiki a matsayin najasa.
Sai dai, sabon binciken bai yi nazarin girman rabo, ko nau'in cakuletin ko kuma irie-irensu da ya kamata a ji dadinsu ba.
Ba a bayyana ba ko wadanda aka yi binciken a kansu sun ci cakulan mai duhu ne, ko cakuleti mai madara ko mai dauke da kayan marmari na kuma mai dauke da koko.
Sakamakon binciken ya ta'allaka ne akan binciken da aka yi a baya wanda ya tabbatar da cewa shan koko (wanda ake samu a cikin cakuleti) ya na rage barazanar kamuwa da ciwon zuciya.
Masana kimiyya sun yi imani da cewa flavonoids da aka samo a cikin cakulan na rage hawan jini sanna ya kuma inganta aikin jijiyoyin jini.
Aikin jijiyoyin jini yana nufin yadda jini ya ke sadar da iskar oxygen da abubuwan gina jiki a cikin jiki da yadda fitar da abubuwa marasa amfani daga jikin.
Dangane da sabon binciken, ba a bayyana cewa ko abubuwan tafi da rayuwa an fifitasu a cikin sakamakon ba.
Dokta Alice Lichtenstein ta yi tsokaci kan bayanan, tana mai nuna cewa wadanda suka yarda da cin cakulan na iya samun "lafiyar jiki mai nauyi."
Ta kuma kara da cewa za su iya "tsunduma a kai a kai" a ayyukan motsa jiki kuma su zama "wadanda ba sa cikin damuwa."
Ta ci gaba da cewa: "Kowane abu na iya yin tasiri na kashin kansa a lafiyar jijiyoyin da suka shafi zuciya."
Rep. Val Demings talks VP candidacy, blasts Trump for pardons

Congresswoman Val Demings (D-Fla.) was not shy about her willingness to serve as vice president under a potential Joe Biden administration as well as her sincere appreciation for being considered for the role.

In a live interview with BlackPressUSA as part of its #FIYAH! Live series, the esteemed member of the Congressional Black Caucus shared her history and the work ethic and commitment that has brought her to this point, stating, "You all know my history. I grew up the daughter of a maid and a janitor in Jacksonville, Florida."
Demings served as one of seven House Impeachment Managers during the January trial of President Donald Trump in the Senate.
Regardless of the Senate acquittal, history will forever note that he is the fourth commander-in-chief to be impeached.
The former House Impeachment Manager, replied in a February interview with NPR from her Capitol Hill office, "Was it worth it? Every day it has been worth it."
Adding, while the verdict was disappointing, Democrats had an obligation to pursue the case regardless of outcome.

During the interview, Demings made it clear that she objects to Trump commuting the prison sentence of Roger Stone, who was convicted of lying to Congress (among other felonies) as well as his pardoning of other felons convicted of similar crimes, stating, "The gall of pardoning your friends, those who lied and cheated to cover up for your wrongdoings."

Demings heads Biden's list of potential running mates along with CBC Chair Karen Bass (D-Calif.), former Georgia State Rep. Stacey Abrams, Sens. Kamala Harris (D-Calif.) and Tammy Duckworth (D-Illinois), Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms, former U.S. Ambassador Susan Rice and a few others.
She noted however, that just one person will decide who will run alongside Joe Biden this fall.
"That's Joe Biden."
Then, while laughing, she raised her hand to her lips in a mock whisper to those viewing the livestream, adding, "If y'all want to make a call... go ahead."
There's no doubt that regardless of one's political leanings, history will look back on this period as a season of evolution in American politics and perceptions.
This fact was not lost on Demings.

She noted that having so any women in consideration for vice presidential candidacy represents an opportunity to break through what remains of the glass ceiling - particularly when it comes to African American women.

"These are the exact opportunities that I work hard for all of my life to create for young boys and girls who may have been told they're the wrong color, don't have enough money, or are the wrong gender," she said.
The congresswoman pledged to make sure that the Democratic National Committee and the Biden campaign advertise and to work with the Black Press of America to get as many as possible out to vote.
"I will make a call to [DNC Head] Tom Perez and I will put this on the top of my list," Demings promised.
She agreed it should be done now, rather than later in the campaign.

Responding to former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's suggestion that Trump might refuse to leave the White House if defeated, and a separate editorial stating that the president is positioning to pardon himself, Demings became animated, "To even suggest pardoning himself made me sick to my stomach."
"But who would ever do that other than Trump?
I think he hates the job.
It's not a job where you should be allowed to break the law and ignore the Constitution.
I think he hates the job, but he hates to lose.
I can see this president not wanting to leave the White House, but we have a way of taking care of that, and if that happens, I just want to be on the team that makes it happen."
'Yar Majalisar Wakilai Val Demings ta yi magana kan takarar mataimakin shugabana kasa, ta kuma caccaki Trunp kan batun gafartawa masu laifi

'Yar majalisar Wakilai Val Demings (Gundumar Florida) ba ta yi kasa a gwiwa ba wajen nuna aniyarta ta zama 'yar takarar neman kujerar mataimakiyar Shugaban kasa a karkashin Joe Biden, ta kuma tsaya tsayin daka na neman hakan.

A wata hira da a ka yi da BlackPressUSA a cikin wani kamfe da ta ke yi da ta yiwa lakabi da #FIYAH! A wani jerin bayanai na kai-tsaye, fitacciyar 'yar majalisar kuma 'yar kungiyar 'yan majalisa bakar fata, ta bayyana tarihin rayuwarta da kuma ayyukanta da ta yi na sadaukarwa da suka kawo ta wannan matsayi, tana mai cewa "duk kun san tarihi na". Ni ubana mai aikin share-share da goge-goge ne uwata kuma aikin boyi-boyi ta ke yi a Jacksonville da ke Florida."
Demings na daya daga cikin 'yan kwamitin mutum bakwai na majalisar dattawa a Janairu kan batun tsige Donald Trump.
Duk da cewa Majalisar Dattawa ta wanke shi, tarihi ba zai taba mantawa da cewa shugaban na Amurka shine na hudu a jerin wadanda aka yi yunkurin tsigewa ba.

Tsohuwar shugabar kwamitin tsige shugaban kasa, a wata hira da ta yi da NPR a ofishinta na Capitol Hill a watan Fabarairu na cewa, "shin kwalliya ta biya kudin sabulu kuwa? " A kowacce rana kwalliya na biyan kudin sabulu"
Bugu da kari, duk da cewa sakamakon ba yadda aka so ba ne, 'yan jam'iyyar Democrats na da damar da bin kadin batun ba tare da la'akari sakamakon ba.

A yayin hirar da ita, Demings ta fito karara ta bayyana cewa ba ta goyon bayan matakin da Shugaba Trump ya dauka na canzawa Roger Stone hukuncin da kotu ta yi na yin karya a gaban majalisar dattawa (cikin daya daga sauran shaidar zur da ya yi) da kuma yafewa sauran wadanda suka aikata laifin tare, sannan ta ci gaba da cewa, "wannan tsaurin ido da rashin hankali na yafewa abokanka, wadanda suka yi karya suka kuma yi shaidar zur don kawai su yi rufa-rufar barnar da ka ke yi."

Demings ce ke kan gaba a jerin wadanda Biden dauka a matsayin abokiyar takararsa, sauran sune shugaban CBC Kren Bass (Gundumar Califnia), tsohon dan majalisa mai wakiltar Geogia, Stacey Admas,Sanata Kamarla Harris (gudumar Califonia) da kuma Tammya Duckworth (gundumar Illinios), da Magajin garin AtlantaKeisha Lance Bottms, da tsohon jakadan Amurka Ambasada Susan Rice da kuma arin wasu mutanen.
Daga karshe ta na mai cewa, duk dai mutum daya ne kadai zai zartar da wanda zai marawa Joe Biden baya a wannan takara.
Wannan mutumun kuwa shine Joe Biden
Sannna, tana dariya sai ta kai hannunta zuwa bakinta cikin raha wai tana rada, ga maus kallon hira kai-tsaye, tana mai cewa "idan kun ga za ku kira shi don kamun kafa... sai ku yi"
Babu makawa dai, ko ma ina mutum ya karkata a siyasa, tarihi ba zai manta da wannan lokaci ba a matsayin wani yanayi na sauyi a siyasar Amurka da kuma fahimtar inda aka sa gaba.
Ana ganin tasirin hakan a kan Demnings.

Ta ce samun mata da yawa su firo takarar Mataimakin dan takarar shugaban kasa na nuni ne ga cewa wata dama ce ta kunno kai don ratsa shigen da ya rage - musamman kan batun mata Amurkawa 'yan asalin Africa.

" wadannan su ne damarmakin da na dade ina hari a rayuwata, watau in samar da wata dama ga matasa maza da mata wadanda a ka dade ana fada musu cewa ba irin launin fatar ikin da ake bukata ba ne, ko ba ku da kudi, ko kuma ku ba irin jinsin da ake so bane." tana mai cewa.

'yar majalisar ta yi alkawarin cewa za ta tabbatar da cewa 'yan kwamitin Jam'iyyar Democrat na kasa da kuma kwamitin yakin nema zaben Biden su yayata sun kuma amince da su yi aiki da kungiyar 'yan jarida bakar fata ta Amurka don ta yadda za a samu mutne da yawa su fita su kada kuri'arsu.
"Zan kirra ta wayar tarho ga [Shugaban kwamintin jami'yya] Tom Perez kuma ba wannan muhimmanci matuka," Demings ta alkawari.
Ta kuma yarda da cewa wannan wani abu ne da ya kamata a yi shi yanzu, a maimakon a a bari sai zuwa wani lokaci tsakiyar yakin neman zabe.

A martaninta ga tsohurwar sakatariyar kula da harkokin kasar waje Hillary Clinton cikin wata shawara da ta bayar da cewa, Trump zai iya kin barin fadar gwamnati na Whte House idan ya sha kaye a zabe, haka kuma a wani sharhi jaridar ba ke cewa Shugaban kasa na dabarun yadda zai yafewa kansa, Demings ta harzuka tana mai cewa" "a ma yi tunaninncewa zai gafartawa kansa, hakan ya sa ni tsanarsa matuka"
"Amma in ban da Trump, waye zai taba tunanin yin hakan?
Ina tunanin dai yana aikin ne kamar an sa shi tilas.
Domin wannan ba aikin da za a sa maka ido kawai ka rika karya doka yadda ka ga dama, ka kuma yi watsi da tsarin mulki.
Ina ganin dai dan dole ya ke aikin nan, amma ba ya son ya fadi zabe.
Daga dukkannin alamu wannan shugabana kasa ba ya so barin fadar White House, amma mun san yadda za mu yi maganinsa, ina ma za a sani a cikin 'yan kwaitin da za su yi haka"
Judge denies attempt to stop order requiring release of children in immigration custody

In a Saturday ruling, Judge Dolly Gee appeared to make the upcoming deadline moot by saying that US Immigration and Customs Enforcement doesn't have to release children if the three ways outlined in her previous order can't be met.
But Gee also underscored in her order that ICE still has a duty to release children in a timely manner.
The three ways Gee had outlined included releasing families who are in ICE detention together, releasing children to a sponsor, or releasing families based upon a federal court order.

Shalyn Fluharty, director of Proyecto Dilley, an organization that offers legal services to families in detention, decried the move as allowing ICE to decide whether to continue keeping children detained.
"The bottom line for me is that kids are detained indefinitely and they have no way out unless ICE agrees to do it or families agree to be separated," Fluharty said.
Families are detained in three facilities run by ICE -- Berks in Pennsylvania, South Texas (Dilley) and Karnes County in Texas.
Children at the facilities range from ages 1 to 17, according to lawyers and advocates who provide legal assistance.

Gee -- who oversees implementation of the Flores Agreement, which governs care of children in custody -- said in June that given "non-compliance or spotty compliance with masking and social distancing rules," it was imperative to transfer children out of the facilities.
There are 969 detainees in ICE custody with positive coronavirus cases who are under isolation or monitoring as of July 23, according to ICE.
Of those, there are 25 confirmed cases in Karnes and one in Dilley, two of the family detention centers.
Overall, there have been more than 3,700 confirmed cases in custody
Mai shari'a ya musanta zarginsa da ake yi na hana aiwatar da umarnin kotu da ta yi umarnin sakim yaran da ke tsare a hannun jami'an kula da shiga da fice.

A hukuncin da ta yanke a zaman da ta ranar Asabar, mai shari'a Dolly Gee ta yi amai ta lashe dangane da matsayar da ta dauka ta na mai cewa hukumar kula da shige da fice ta Amurka ba sai ta saki yaran nan da ke hannunta ba idan har hanyoyin guda uku da ta zana ba kawo su a hunkuncin da ta yanke a baya kan wannan batun ba.
Amma mai shari'ar ta jaddada a umarnin da ta bayar cewa duk da haka hukumar kula da shige da ficen ICE ta na da hakkin sakin yaran a lokacin da ya dace.

Hanyoyin da Mai shari'ar ta zayyana sun hada da sakim iyalan da ke tsare a hannun hukumar ICE a tare, sakin yaran ga wani wanda zai dauki nauyinsu ko sakin iyalai a bisa dogaro da wani umarnin kotun tarayya

Shalyn Fluharty, daraktan Proyeco Dilley, wata kungiya da ta ke bayar da taimako ta fuska doka ga iyalan da ke tsare, ta yi Allah wadai da yunkurin da zai ba hukumar ICE damar daukan hukuncin ko su ci gaba da tsare yara a wurnsu.

Fluharty na mai cewa "Ni a wurina hakan na nufi cewa za iya tsare yara har illa ma shaAllah kuma ba su da wata hanyar fita sai har hukumar ICE ta yarda da hakan ko kuma iyali sun amince su rabu tukunna.
Ana tsare iyalai a wasu wuraren tsare mutane da hukumar ICE ba kula da su-Berks da ke Pennsylvania, da Texas ta kudu, (Dilley) da kuma gundumar Karnes shima a Texas.
Shekarun yaran da ake tsare da su a wuraren su n kama ne daga shekara 1 zuwa 12, a cewar lauyoyi da kuma masu bayar da shawara wadan da ke bayar da taikmako ta fuskar shari'a.

Gee - wacce ta ke sa ido kan aiki da yarjejeniyar Flores wacce ta shardanta kiula da yaran da ke tsare -- tana mai cewa a watan Yuni " rashin aiki yadda ya kamata da yarjejeniyar ko kuma banager-bangera da kuma kin aiki da ka'idar sa takunkumi da bayar da tazara da juna ", hakan zai tilasta a dauke kula da yaran zuwa wani wuri daban
Da akwai wadanda ake tsare da su 969 a hannun hukumar ICE da ke dauke da cutar Koronabirus wadanda ko an killacesu ko kuma an sa musu ido har zuwa ranar 23 na watan Yuli, a cewar hukumar ICE.
Cikin wadannan adadi, da akwai 25 da aka tabbatar suna dauke da cutar a Karnes, daya a Dillsy, biyu daga cikin wuraren tsare da iyalai.
A baki daya dai, an samu a sama da mutane 3,700 wadanda ake da tabbacin cewa sun kamu a yayin da suke tsare
White Lines star Laura Haddock, 34, goes house-hunting with her 28-year-old lover Tom Rhys Harries

They started dating on the set of White Lines, a drama about debauchery on Ibiza - but when Laura Haddock and her boyfriend Tom Rhys Harries went house-hunting last week, they cut an image of relaxed calm far from the hedonism of the party island.
The couple, who played brother and sister in the hit Netflix series, were spotted as they viewed a stunning Oxfordshire farmhouse, which is on the market for £1.2 million.
They arrived in a Range Rover driven by Laura, 34, wearing denim shorts and a white top, and were met by an estate agent who ushered them inside for a look around the five-bedroom home.
In White Lines, which was filmed last autumn, Laura played Zoe Walker, who discovers the seedy side of Ibiza as she investigates the murder of her DJ brother Axel, played by 28-year-old Tom.
News of their relationship only emerged earlier this month, less than a year after the collapse of Laura's six-year marriage to Sam Claflin, who starred in The Hunger Games films.
Together they have a son, four-year-old Pip, and a daughter Margot, two.

When they announced their split last August, Claflin, 34, wrote on Instagram: "Laura and I have decided to legally separate. We will move forward with nothing but love, friendship and a deep respect for one another whilst we continue to raise our family together."
Laura and Sam first met in 2011 at an audition and Sam, who's also been in Peaky Blinders, described their marriage in 2013 as "easily one of his greatest achievements."
Before White Lines, Laura appeared in the first Inbetweeners film and last year's BBC crime-drama The Capture, playing lawyer Hannah Roberts.
Tom has appeared in the Inbetweeners sequel and Sky drama Britannia.
Jarumar Shirin White Star Laura Haddock 'yar shekara 34 ta tafi neman gida tare da tsohon masoyinta Tom Rhys Harries dan shekara 28

Sun soma soyayyane ne a wajen daukar shirin White Lines, wani wasan kwaikwayo kan rayuwar sheke aya a tsibirin Ibiza - amma daga ranar da Laura Haddock da saurayinta Tom Rhys Harries suka je neman gidan zama a makon jiya, sai suka bayyana a matsayin wandanda ke cikin kwanciyar hankali daban da 'yar rayuwar sharholiyarsa na cikin shirin.

Masoyan da ke fitowa a matsayin wa da kanwa a cikin shirin mai farin jini daukar nauyin kamfanin NETFLIX, an gan su ne a lokacin da suka je kallon wani gidan gona mai dan karen kyau siffar Oxfordshire wanda ake neman fam miliyan 1.2.

Sun iso wurin ne a wata mota kirar Range Rover wacce Laura ke tukawa 'yar shekara 34, tana sanye da gajeren wando na denim, da kuma farar riga a inda dillalin gidan wanda ya shigar da su gidan mai dakunan kawana 5 na alfarma domin su ganewa idonsu.

A cikin shirin na 'white Lines wanda aka dauka da kaka, Zoe Walker wacce ta fito a Laura, ta gano rayuwar sharholiya na Ibiza a lokacin da ta ke binciken kisan gillan da aka yiwa a dan uwanta Axel mai wasan DJ wanda Tom dan shekara 28 ya fito.
Labarin soyayyarsu bai bayyana ba sai farkon watan nan, kasa da shekara guda bayan mutuwar aurenta da Sam Claflin na tsawon shekara shida, wada ya fito a fim din nan mai suna 'The Hunger Games.
Sun haifi da namiji mai shekara hudu mai suna Pip da kuma 'ya mace mai suna Margot 'yar shekara biyu.

A lokacin da suka sanar da rabuwarsu a watan Ogustan da ya wuce, Claflin dan shekara 34 ya rubuta a shafinsa na dandalin sada zumunta na Instagram: "Laura da ni mun yanke shawarar da mu kawo karshen aurenmun. Babu komai a tsakaninmu yanzu sai abin da ba a rasa ba na kauna da matukar mutunta juna, za kuma ci gaba da kokarin kula da yaranmu tare."

Laura da Sam sun fara haduwa ne a shekarar 2011 a wani gwajin 'yan wasa, sai kuma shi Sam da ya ke fitowa a cikin shirn 'Peaky Blinders' ya kwatanta aurensu a shekarar 2013 a matsayin " wata babbar nasara a rayuwarsa baki dayanta."
Kafi shirin 'White Lines' Laura ta fito a farko a wasu shirye-shiryen fin da kuma shirin wasan kwaikwayo na BBC "The Capture" a inda ta fito a matsayin Lauya Hanna Roberts.
Tom kuma ya fito a cigaban shirin 'Inbetweeners' da kuma wani wasan kwaikwayo na 'Britannia' na gidan talbijin din SKY.
Hundreds Of Demonstrators Gather In Downtown LA In Solidarity With Portland Protesters

LOS ANGELES (CBSLA) - About 300 protesters gathered in downtown Los Angeles on Saturday afternoon in support of a two-month-long movement in Portland, Oregon, where federal law enforcement officials are under scrutiny after clashes with protesters.
There were similar rallies throughout the U.S. in Boston, Chicago, Cleveland, New York and other cities.
The L.A. demonstrations were organized by the groups Refuse Fascism and Youth Liberation Front.
The crowd marched to the Los Angeles Police Department headquarters at First and Main streets, then to the Metropolitan Detention Center.
Participants also moved to the Alameda offramp of the 101 Freeway, but later left.
Some of the people in the group were seen breaking windows of the downtown federal building and federal signage has been graffitied with profanities.
At least one arrest was made during the protests.
Daruruwan Masu Zanga-zanga Sun Taru a Cikin Garin LA don nina goyon bayansu ga masu Zanga-zangar Portland

LOS ANGELES (CBSLA) - Kimanin masu zanga-zanga 300 ne suka hallara a cikin garin Los Angeles a ranar Asabar da rana don nuna goyon baya ga wani gangami na tsawon watanni biyu a Portland, Oregon, inda jami'an tsaro na tarayya ake bincikar su bayan wata arangama da suka yi da masu zanga-zangar.
An yi irin wadannan taron a duk fadin Amurka a Boston, da Chicago, da Cleveland, da New York da kuma sauran wasu biranen.
Kungiyoyin ƙin jin jinin mulkin kama-karya da na samar da 'yancin matasa ne suka shirya zanga-zangar ta LA.
Gangamin taron Jama’ar sun yi tattaki ne zuwa hedkwatar Ofishin ‘yan sanda na Los Angeles da ke Farkon da kuma Babban tituna, sannan zuwa Cibiyar Tsare jama'a ta cikin birni.
Har ila yau masu zanga-zangar sun koma zuwa ga filin Alameda na babar hanyar 101, amma daga baya suka tafi.

Wasu daga cikin masu zanga-zangar an gansu suna farfasa tagogin gine-ginen gwamanatin tarayya na cikin gari da alamomin hanya da kuma allunan sunayen wurare na hukumomin tarayya wadanda suka zazzane su da kalaman batanci.
Aƙalla an kama mutum ɗaya a yayin zanga-zangar.
Prince Harry news: Duke of Sussex's friend lashes out at explosive claims in new book
Mr Stott told Sky News that Prince Harry and Meghan Markle that the content within the book was no different to that in tabloids other than it was in a hardback.
The former soldier called for more focus on the good the couple do including their charity work.
Mr Stott said: "I think what we are reading here is no different from what we have read in the tabloids it is now just on a hardback."
"You have got an author's persona, it is still not guaranteed that it has come from them."
"I just think it is another sort of attack like the tabloids trying to persecute them."
"I understand they are in the public eye and people wish to know what they are doing but I wish the focus was more on the good that they do and the charity work rather than their intimate privacies."
"But because of who they are they will never get away from that of course."
On Saturday a royal historian also stated that the Duke and Duchess of Sussex supporting the Queen "overshadowed" other members of the Royal Family.
Dr Kate Williams told Sky News that the Royal Family were unable to harness Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's star power.
The royal commentator added that the Royal Family has a strict hierarchy but that public interest cannot be directed or controlled.
She continued: "The fact is that whatever they did to support the Queen would often overshadow other members of the Royal Family and that was seen as a problem."
"They have this huge star power."
"They had a small wedding than most siblings in the same position, Andrew had a huge wedding, Anne had a huge wedding."
"They had a small wedding but still the coverage of Harry and Meghan's wedding even though it was smaller was still as big as William's and Kate's because there is a worldwide fascination with them."
Labarin Yarima Harry: Abokin mai sarautar Duke ya mayar da martani mai zafi kan wasu ikirari masu ta da hankali game mai sarautar a wani sabon littafi

Mista Stott ya fadawa shirin labarai na gidan Talbijin na SKY cewa abin da ke cikin littafin game da yarima Harry da kuma Meghan Markle ba shi da wani banbancin da abin da ke cikin jaridun labaran karin gishiri.
Tsoho sojin ya yi kira da cewa kamata ya yi a mayar da hankali kan abubuwan alheri da ma'auratan ke yi wanda ya hada da ayyukan da su ke yi na taimakon al'umma.
Mista Stott ya na mai cewa: "ina ganin abin da mu ke karantawa a nan ba shi da banbanci da abin da mu ke karantawa a shafukan jaridun labaran karin gishiri da kawai a ka mayar da shi littafi."
"Akwai ra'ayin marubuci kan yadda ya ke kallon mutum a nan, wannan abin da ya rubuta babu tabbacin cewa daga garesu ya ke"

"Na fahimci cewa hankalin jama'a yanzu ya na kansu kuma mutane su na so su ji abin da suke yi, amma da zan so a ce an mayar da hankali ne kan irin abubuwan alheri da suke yi da ayyukan taimakon jama'a, a maimakon wanni abin da ya shafi rayuwarsu ta kashin kansu"

Mai sharhi a kan al'amuran gidan sarauta ta kara da cewa gidana sarautar na da wani tsari na fifiko, amma hankalin jama'a dangane da abin da suke so ba za a iya yi masa shamaki ko dakile shi ba.

Ta kuma cigaba da cewa: "gaskiyar mangana shine duk abin da suka yi don tallafawa saraunniya sai hakan ya dankwafar da abubuwan da sauran 'ya 'yan gidan sarautar ke yi, hakan kuma sai a rika ganinsa a matsayin wata matsala."
"Suna da wannan gagarimin farin jini."
"Sun bikin aurenu na rufin asiri babu wata kasaiata kasa da sauran 'ya 'yan gidan sarautar da suke matsayi daya, Andrew yayi ksauataccen biki, Anne ta yi kasaitaccen biki a aurenta."

"Sun yi dan kwarya-kwaryar biki amma duk da haka irin yadda aka yayata bikin Harray da Meghan duk da cewa bai kai na sauran William da Kate kasaita ba, amma saboda sun dauki hankalin duniya sai ya samu yayatarwa da na sauran ya samu."
South Africa: Ashwell Prince and Marsha Cox Speak On Experiences of Discrimination
Over the last few weeks it has become evident that are many skeletons in relation to racial discrimination in South African sport.
Constructive conversations need to be had and action has to be taken in order to forge more inclusive sports.
Former Proteas batting star Ashwell Prince has lashed out at his former white team mates, accusing them of racial bias by labelling him and other black squad members as "quota players."
Prince said that in the Proteas team black players were openly labelled "quota players" by their white teammates.
Adding that it is sad that even when black players such as Makhaya Ntini and now Kagiso Rabada who ascended to the pinnacle of the game, they still have the quota tag attached to them by some people.
Prince, the current coach of the Cape Cobras franchise, made the comments on a webinar hosted by the United Coalition for Sport and Community Based Organisations (UCSCBO) on Thursday night.
The organisation aims to further the raging conversation of historic racial discrimination in South African sports.

Coleen Rooney hires Johnny Depp's barrister for her Wagatha Christie battle with Rebekah Vardy
Mrs Rooney has asked David Sherborne to fight claims she defamed Mrs Vardy
After talks between WAGs failed, insiders are expecting dramatic showdown
Coleen Rooney has hired the celebrity barrister acting for Johnny Depp in his blockbuster libel case to represent her in the "Wagatha Christie" legal battle with Rebekah Vardy.

The Mail on Sunday understands that Mrs Rooney has instructed David Sherborne to fight claims she defamed Mrs Vardy with allegations that personal information was leaked from her private Instagram account to a newspaper.

The news comes days after documents submitted to the High Court claimed that Mrs Vardy, who is married to Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy, suffered physical and mental anguish as a result of Mrs Rooney's allegations.

The papers say the 38-year-old mother of five "suffered from severe panic attacks and anxiety which manifested in being scared to leave the house," adding that Mrs Vardy, who was seven months pregnant at the time, "was taken to hospital three times... as she suffered anxiety attacks as a result of the post and the repercussions of it."

As well as representing Depp in his libel action against The Sun over allegations the actor was a wife-beater, Mr Sherborne, 50, is acting for the Duke and Duchess of Sussex in their privacy claim against Associated Newspapers, publishers of The Mail on Sunday.
After mediation talks between the two WAGs failed, insiders are now expecting a dramatic courtroom showdown.
"If you thought the Depp trial was box office, don't underestimate this forthcoming WAG war," said a source.
"It really is war now. Coleen will not back down, neither will Becky. It will be sensational stuff."
Mrs Rooney claimed that someone using Mrs Vardy's Instagram account had leaked fake stories about her to a newspaper.

She was nicknamed "Wagatha Christie" after revealing how she had she spent five months slowly limiting the number of friends who could see her updates on Instagram stories until only Mrs Vardy's account remained.
Mrs Rooney claims she then posted a fake story on Instagram, which was later published in a red-top newspaper.

In her legal submission, Mrs Vardy, who has denied involvement, alleges that she was made to feel like a "scapegoat" after Mrs Rooney posted the allegations "in a calculated and deliberate manner that was designed to cause very serious harm and enormous distress."
But Mrs Rooney's team has challenged the claim, alleging that details of her anguish are a "PR exercise" that distracts from the facts.
A source said: "Becky's papers are a sideshow, it is all so spurious."
Mrs Rooney - who has four sons with former England star Wayne Rooney - is being represented by lawyer Paul Lunt, of Liverpool-based legal firm Brabners.
Mrs Vardy is with London company Kingsley Napley, but it is unclear if she has yet instructed a barrister.
A spokesman for Mrs Rooney declined to comment.
Abin ba karamin fito-na fito ba ne!
Coleen Rooney ya dau hayar Lauyan Johnny Depp a fafatawar da ke yi tasakaninta da Rabekah-Vardy kan Wagatha Christie
Uwaragida Rooney ta sa David Sherborne shigar da kara kan bata sunan da Madam Vardy ta yi mata
Bayan duk wani kokarin sasantasu ya gagara, 'yan gazagani na sa ran a yi kare-jini, birin jini na ban mamaki
Coleen Rooney ta dau hayar wani fitataccen Lauyan jarumin fina finai Johnny Depp da ya ke tsaya masa a shari'arsa. Shine zai tasya mata a shari'ar da ta ke na "Wagatha Chritie" da Rabekah Vardy.

Jaridar The Mail mai fitowa ranakun Lahadi ta fahimci cewa Madam Rooney ta umarci David Sherborne da ya shigar kara kan zargin bata sunan da Misisi Vardy ta yi mata na tsegunta wasu bayanai daga sahafinta na sada zumunta na Instagram ga wata jarida.

Wannan labari na zuwa ne bayan wasu 'yan kwanaki da aka mika wasu takardun shigar da kara a wata babbar kotu a inda ake zargin cewa uwargida Vardy, wacce ke auren dan wasan kwallon kafa ta kungiyar Leicester City Jamie Vardy, ta cutu a jiki da kuma kwakwalwa sakamakon azabtarwar da ta samu daga zarge-zargen da Misisi Rooney ta yi mata.

Takardun sun kuma ce 'yar 38 da haihuwa kuma uwar 'ya 'ya biyar "ta samu cutuwa daga tsananin azaba da tashin hankali wanda ya hakan ya bayyana ta yadda ta ke tsoron barin gida". Ta na mai karawa da cewa Varday, wacce ta ke dauke da ciki wata bakwai a lokacin. "an kai ta asibiti sau ukku... tana fama da cutar damuwaa sakamakon bayanan da aka saka da kuma abubuwan da suka biyo baya."

Da kuma wakiltar Depp a kararsa da ya kai jaridar The Sun kan zarginsa da ta yi na cewa jarumin fina finan mai duka mata ne, Mista Sherborne, dan shekara 50 na wakiltar mai sarautar gargajiya na Duke da matarsa Duchess na garin Sussex a karar da suka shigar a keta musu haddi kan kamfanin Associated Newspapers. Masu wallafa jaridar The Mail mai fitowa kowacce ranar Lahadi.
Bayan tattaunawar samun masalaha tsakanin ma karayan biyu,'yan gaza gani sun sa ran ganin tirka-tirka na ban mamaki a kotu a yayin shari'ar.
"Idan ma kana tunanin wannan Sharai'ar da jarumin fina finai wani shirin fim ne, to ka gyara zama ka saha kallon", a cewar wata majiya.
"Lallai danbarwara da ba karama ba ce. Coleen ba za ta hakura ba, haka ita ma Becky. Shari'ar za ta ja hankali sosai."
Rooneey ta na zargin cewa wani ya yi amfani da shafin sada zumunta na Instagram na misisi Vardy ya tseguntawa wata jarida wasu labaran karya dangane da ita.

An yi mata lakabi da "Wagatha Christe ne" fbayan ta yi bayanin yadda sanu a hankali ta shafe wata biyar tana rage yawan mutane da ke bibiyarta a shafin sada zumunta na Instagram har ya rage Misisi Vardy ce kadai ta rage.
Misis Rooney sannan ta yi ikirarin cewa, at saka wani labarin karya a shafin nata na sada zumunta na Instagram, wanda kuma labarin ya bayyana a shafin wata fitacciyar jarida.

A na ta karriyar a gaban shari'a. Misisi Vardy wacce ta musanta zargin, ta ce "an dora mata laifukan wasu ne da bada hakkinta ba, bayan da Misisi Rooney ta ce ta yada zarge-zargen ne da gangangan da kuma aniyar cutar da ita, cuta mai tsanani da kuma sa ta cikin tashin hankali"
Amma lauyoyin Misisi Rooney suka kalubalanaci wannan ikirari, suna mai zargin cewa bayanan irirn halin da ta shiga, "wasan kwaikwayo ne kawai" da ka iya dauke hankali daga ainihin gaskiyar lamari.
Wata majiya tna cewa, "takardun da Becky ta shigar a gaban kotu shirme ne, duk ba su da makama."
Rooney wacce ke auren tsohon fitaccen dan wasa kallon kafa Wayne Rooney - Lauya Paul Lunt ne ke wakiltarta a kotu, daga ofishin lauyoyi da ke Liverpool mai suna Brabners.
Vardy kuwa tana tere da Kingsley Napley na wania Kamfani a London, amma har yanzu ba a sani ba ko ta dauki lauya.
Mai magana da yawon Rooney ya ki ya ce komai.
Alibaba, Jack Ma summoned by Gurugram court on former employee's complaint

Gurugram, July 26: In a major development, Alibaba and its founder Jack Ma has been summoned by a Gurugram court after the company's former employee alleged that he was fired for objecting censorship and fake news on company's applications.

The case is filed in Gurugram district court and Civil Judge Sonia Sheokand has issued a summons for Alibaba, Jack Ma and about a dozen others, and has asked them to appear on July 29, as per reports.
The judge has also sought written responses from the company, Reuters reported.
Parmar, who was an employee of the UC Web office in Gurugram until October 2017, is seeking $268,000 in damages, according to court documents.
"We are unwavering in its commitment to the Indian market and the welfare of its local employees, and its policies are in compliance with local laws.
We are unable to comment on ongoing litigation," UC India stated in a statement.

"The lawsuit also contains a "sensitive words list" with key words in Hindi and English like "India-China border" and "Sino-India war" that the court filing alleges were used by UC Web to censor content on its platforms in India," Reuters reported.
Last month, the Home Ministry had banned 59 Chinese mobile apps including UC News, UC Browser amidst border tensions between the two countries.
Wata Kotu a Gurugram ta yi sammacin Kamafanin Alibaba, da Jack Ma a bisa wata kara da wani tsohon ma'aikaci ya yi

Gurugram ranar 26 ga watan Yuli. A wani cigaban kuma, Kamfanin Alibaba da kuma wanda ya kirkiri kamfanin wata kotu a gurugram ta yi sammacinsu bayan da wani tsohon ma'aakacin kamfanin ya yi zargin cewa an kore shi daga aiki saboda ya bijirewa tantacewa da kuma labarin karya na manhajar kamfanin.

An shigar da karar ne a wata Kotu da ke lardin Guragram wacce wani alkali Sonia Sheokand ta bayar aika da takardar sammaci ga Kamafanin Alibaba da kuma Jack Ma da kuma karin wasu su kusan goma sha biyu tare da umartarsu da su bayyana a gabanta aranara 29 ga watan Yuli a cewar rahotanni.
Alkalin ya kuma bukaci amsar tuhumar a rubuce daga kamafanin, a cewar wani rahotoi na kamafani labarai na Reuters.

Parmar wanda a da, yake aiki a ofishin UC Web a Gurugram kafin sallamarsa a watan Oktobar shekarar 2017 ya na neman a biya shi diyyar $268,000 a matsayin diyya, in ji takardun shigar da kara na Kotun.
"Ba za mu yi kasa a gwiwa ba wajan sadaukar da kai ga kasuwar Indiya da kuma jin daɗin ma'aikatanta na gida, kuma manufofinta suna bin dokokin ƙasa.
Ba mu da ikon yin tsokaci kan karar da aka shigar, " UC India ta bayyana a cikin wata sanarwa.

"Shari'ar ta kuma ƙunshi" jerin wasu kalmomin masu iya haifar da rudani "tare da wasu kalmomi irinsu a cikin yaren Hindi da Ingilishi kamar" iyakar Indiya da China "da" Yaƙin Sino-Indiya "wadanda kotun da ke suararon karar ta yi zargin cewa UC Web ne ya yi amfani da su don tantance abubuwan da ke cikin dandamalinta a Indiya, "Reuters ta ruwaito.
A watan da ya gabata, ma’aikatar cikin gida ta dakatar da manhajojin wayar hannu 59 na kasar Sin da suka hada da UC News, UC Browser a cikin rikicin kan iyaka a tsakanin kasashen biyu.

The Youth Olympic Games were scheduled to take place in Dakar next year, but they have been moved to 2026 due to the coronavirus pandemic after an agreement between the International Olympic Committee (IOC) and Senegal.

Stomach bloating: Tips to reduce pain include taking anise
The link to depression is not coincidental.

People living with IBS, a disorder characterised by abdominal pain, cramping, bloating, gas, constipation, and diarrhoea, frequently suffer from anxiety and depression, which can worsen symptoms, according to the Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA).
"That's because the colon is in part controlled by the nervous system, which responds to stress," explains the ADAA.
If your bloating still persists, it could be a sign of a food intolerance.
